string.name: STR_DIC_TEST05
string.body: Crestlich Beak;This item does not actually exist. People only pretend they have obtained it. This is only one of many tricks in the game world, so do not be surprised by these tricks.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA01
string.body: Kales' Letter of Introduction;A letter from Kales, introducing you to Polinia so that you can get help from her.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA02
string.body: Broken Axe;The object a woodcutter is anxiously searching for.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA03
string.body: Feira's Fish;A bundle of fish that Feira wants to deliver to her husband, who is a cook.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA04
string.body: Blank Tribute Report;A blank document to list the items to be offered at the feast of Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA05
string.body: Completed Tribute Report;A document which lists the items to be offered at the feast of Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA06
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA07
string.body: Pernos' Robe;A dress that Mune asked you to deliver to Pernos. It is very light and soft.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA08
string.body: Nymph's Feathered Gown;A robe you picked up at the Nymph's Pond.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA09
string.body: Sword Used to Attack Duaguru;An unpolished weapon to which magical power has not been imbued yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA10
string.body: Mace Used to Attack Duaguru;An unrefined weapon to which magical power has not been imbued yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA11
string.body: Dagger Used to Attack Duaguru;A blunt weapon to which magical power has not been imbued yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA12
string.body: Aion Stone Fragment;A fragment of the Tower of Light.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA13
string.body: Letter from Manos;A letter that Manos asked you to deliver to his son, Qydro.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA14
string.body: Seal of Tolbas Village;A seal that Santenius uses on official documents. The Kobolds from the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12] have stolen it.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA15
string.body: Letter from Qydro;A letter from Qydro to Manos.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA16
string.body: Kobold Orders;A Kobold mining document.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA17
string.body: Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report Chapter 1;The first chapter of <Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report>.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA18
string.body: Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report Chapter 2;The second chapter of <Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report>.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA19
string.body: Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report Chapter 3;The third chapter of <Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report>.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA20
string.body: Wedding Ring;The wedding ring of Alteno and Enia. Apparently Alteno lost it at the Ellun River Mouth.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA21
string.body: Empty Crystal Bottle;A special bottle designed to carry holy water.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA22
string.body: Full Crystal Bottle;A bottle full of holy water.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA23
string.body: Ancient Stone Fragment;A piece of stone with an image on one side and strange letters on the other.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA24
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA25
string.body: Lepharist Revolutionaries Orders;A document which describes a plan to destroy the Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_ILA26
string.body: Siel's Crystal Ball;A crystal ball which can gather holy magical power by absorbing energy from various parts of Elysea.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA01
string.body: Sprigg Spirit Globe;The hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA01], whose spirit wanders about the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA01].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA02
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA03
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA04
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA05
string.body: Airon Meat;Rump meat from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA05]. Very tasty roasted over an open fire.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA06
string.body: Sylphen Wing;A delicate, transparent wing from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA07]. It smells strongly like fish.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA07
string.body: Abex Skin;The skin from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA06]. It is light and smooth, and is used for making Luxury Clothing.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA08
string.body: Worg Tail Fur;Leather from the tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA10]. A rare specimen, carefully harvested.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA09
string.body: Bellepig Hock Meat;Meat from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA09]. It tastes like Porgus meat, but slightly tougher.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA10
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA11
string.body: Juvenile Sparkie Luciferin;The fluorescent part of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA04_1]'s tail.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA12
string.body: Sparkie Luciferin;The fluorescent part of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA08]'s tail.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA13
string.body: Elder Sparkie Luciferin;The fluorescent part of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA44]'s tail.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA14
string.body: Scar Fang;A fang from [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA11]. It can be used to make luxury accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA15
string.body: Abex Horn;A long horn from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA06]. It is used to make buttons or accessories.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA16
string.body: Brax Hoof;The hind leg hoof of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA134]. It is strong and frequently used for buttons.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA17
string.body: Tutty's Bone;The bone of Porgus Tutty, which was raised by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA36]. It can be obtained from the Kobolds that ate Tutty.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA18
string.body: Spore Powder;It can be obtained by hunting Fungen on the Agaric Spore Road.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA19
string.body: Rusted Cogwheel;A part of a device that was used to run the windmill in Timolia Mine.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA20
string.body: Belbua's Land Registration Certificate;The title to Belbua's farm. It's been handed down for generations.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA21
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA22
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA23
string.body: Letter from Morai;A letter of request from [%dic:STR_DIC_LA33] to [%dic:STR_DIC_LA34].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA24
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA25
string.body: Hoverstone Particles;Silvery powder extracted from the stones floating in the sky.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA26
string.body: Mysterious Stone;A stone of magical power used to make a Holy Mark of the Protector.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA27
string.body: Frillneck Egg;A small egg, bluish in color.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA28
string.body: Meeting Schedule;The Lepharists hold meetings every evening at the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24]. They do not have cookies.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA29
string.body: Altar of the Crimson Dragon Report;An ancient book frequently quoted in other ancient books, but no one has ever seen the actual tome, yet.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA30
string.body: Crystal bottle;A bottle made of crystal. It hold the ceremonial holy water.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA31
string.body: Illustrated Guide to Superior Poisons;A manual of rare poisons. Not a lick-and-taste book.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA32
string.body: Cliona Crystal;A special crystal formed in the body of organisms living in Cliona Lake. It can be obtained by hunting monsters such as [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA02]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA04]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA05]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA33
string.body: Contaminated Water Sample;A bottle which contains water from the waterfall near the Altar of the Crimson Dragon.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA34
string.body: Meslamtaeda's Blood;The poison created by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA54] and [%dic:STR_DIC_LA55]. It is named after [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA48].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA35
string.body: Marble of the Fiend;A marble contained within the [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA26]. It influences the owner to have a more negative personality.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA36
string.body: Kalgolem Essence;A small stone piece obtained by breaking a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA26].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA37
string.body: Villagers' Loot;The items that Kobolds stole from Tolbas Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA38
string.body: Mark of the Dead;A mark of the memory of death carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA55]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA39
string.body: Not in use;Not in use

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA40
string.body: Rock Lime;The lime of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA26].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA41
string.body: Tainted Stone;A kind of crystal formed inside the body of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA56], raised near the source of contamination.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA64
string.body: Mushroom Spores;Spores from a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA12_2]. They can be used to create potions or magical items.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA65
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol;A symbol known to be carried by Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA66
string.body: Krall Mark;An insignia taken from the Krall armor found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA67
string.body: Kerubar Fang;The fang of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA117].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA68
string.body: Flute of Elim;A flute made from Daminu's branch. Playing the flute wakes the Elders of the Elim.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA69
string.body: Kerub Grain Sack;A sack of grains located in the old farming area to the southwest of the Akarios Plains, known as [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA26].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA70
string.body: Fungie Heart;The central spore cluster of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA12_1]. If you look at it from a certain angle it is shaped sort of like a heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA71
string.body: Daminu's Essence;A fruit borne by [%dic:STR_DIC_LA51] only once every few decades. You can recover lost memories by eating it.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA72
string.body: Grain Snuffler Tail;The tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA132]. Purportedly meaty and tasty.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA73
string.body: The Nymph In Folklore;A book exploring the folktale about a nymph and a woodcutter. It's a copy of the original, which is stored in the library in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA74
string.body: Starcrab Carapace;A sharp carapace which can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA140].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA75
string.body: Starturtle Shell;A strong shell which can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA16_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA76
string.body: Crystal Fragment;A hard mineral piece found on the riverbed around [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA77
string.body: Tog Tail;A strong tail which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA143].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA78
string.body: Pluma Claw;The claw which can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA144].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA79
string.body: Abex Hock Meat;Tasty meat which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA146].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA80
string.body: Gryphu Breast Meat;Meat which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA145]. This meat is rather tough so it is better with alcoholic drinks.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA81
string.body: Soporific Mushroom;Poisonous mushrooms found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA18]. Eating them makes you drowsy.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA82
string.body: Krall Weapon;It can be found in a Krall supply box located at [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA22].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA83
string.body: Ribbit Blood;The bodily fluid of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA56].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA84
string.body: Kalgolem Essence;A small stone piece which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA26].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA85
string.body: Swamp Plant Root;The root of a [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA82] growing in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA17].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA86
string.body: Mysterious Stone Fragment;A piece of a [%dic:STR_DIC_ELA83].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA87
string.body: Wriggot Villi;The villi on the skin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA54] living in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20]. It is used to suck the sap out of trees.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA88
string.body: Sharp Pincers;Pincers made of the hard carapace of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA150].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA89
string.body: Studded Odium Necklace;Necklace of the [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA151]. This is a symbol of the Krall leader.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA90
string.body: Sacred Image of Kaisinel;This is the gift of blessing for pilgrims on the Great Pilgrimage. It can be obtained by killing the Krall protecting the road between the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA140
string.body: First Aid Medicine;The stem of a plant which should be carried from Q5031 to Galar/ field object.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA141
string.body: Daru Horn;A local specialty that should be obtained in 5019.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA142
string.body: Aldelle Crystal;The crystal inside the body of monsters living in Aldelle Lake. Q5004

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA143
string.body: Red Gem;A quest item dropped by Q 5013 monsters.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA144
string.body: Small Soul;This stone can be obtained in Q5017 and is used to summon a soul.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA145
string.body: Tasty Meat;Flavorful flesh that can be obtained in Q5021 to give to Munin.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA146
string.body: Aetherium;The accumulated mass of Aether energy which is used as a fuel for ships and vehicles in Q5011.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA147
string.body: Q5011;Item divergence 2 favored by the Captain.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA148
string.body: Q5011;Item divergence 3 favored by the Captain that is hard to obtain.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA149
string.body: Q5011;Item divergence 4 favored by the Captain that is very rare.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA150
string.body: Q5024;This is wanted by Munin and can be obtained from Aether plant object in Odella field.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA151
string.body: Q5026;Various possessions of Mau.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA152
string.body: Noble Ice Crystal;A piece of ice infused with Aether energy. (Q5033)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA153
string.body: Lobnite Carapace;The tough shell of a Lobnite. (Q5034)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA154
string.body: Tog Leather;This is the highest Luxury Leather among all kinds of animal leather. (Q5037)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA155
string.body: Someone's Poison Sac;A strong poison obtained by hunting monsters (Q5045)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA156
string.body: MuMu Arrowhead;A thin arrowhead used by the MuMu. (Q5046)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA157
string.body: MuMu Mark;A mark that MuMu Skurvs carry around (Q5047)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA158
string.body: Q5050 Mark;The mark which should be taken after killing Q5050 monster.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA159
string.body: Q5057 Item;An item necessary for the private ceremony for all living creatures.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA160
string.body: Lumiel's Crystal Ball;It measures the Aether energy and is used in Q5055 and mentioned in Q5058.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA161
string.body: Zikel's Wrath;A bottle that can restrain the unholy life of monsters (Q5059).

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA162
string.body: Restrained Spirit;An item that can be obtained in Q5059 and should be used in Q5060.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA163
string.body: Exquisite Claw;An item which should be obtained by killing monsters in the northern swamp in Q5065.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA164
string.body: Dangerous Item;A dangerous drop item found in Mahindel swamp in Q5075.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA165
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol;A badge on which a torch shape is engraved.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA166
string.body: Q5086;Lepharist subversive document.

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA167
string.body: Essence of Life;An item dropped by all monsters hunted in the Shadow Spirit forest. (Q5089)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA168
string.body: Hunter's Glory;An item rewarded in Q5057 and necessary for Q5063. (5063)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA169
string.body: Food 1;Mosbear's favorite food 1

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA170
string.body: Food 2;Mosbear's favorite food 2

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA171
string.body: Food 3;Mosbear's favorite food 3

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA172
string.body: Food 4;Mosbear's favorite food 4

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA173
string.body: Snuffler Meat;The meat for airship survivors. (Q5002)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA174
string.body: Brax Meat;This meat will be offered for a sacrificial rite. (Q5004)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA175
string.body: Qooqoo Meat;A famous steak dish in Asmodae which is best cooked by Ongfu. (Q5007)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA176
string.body: Sylphen Fluid;An ingredient of an alcoholic drink for sailors. (Q5011)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA177
string.body: Sparkie Sap;An oil used to treat leather for tanning. (Q5016)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA178
string.body: Karnif Meat;The meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA310]. A delicacy for Munin. (Q5015)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA179
string.body: Named Karnif Meat;The meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA348]. A delicacy for Munin. (Q5015)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA180
string.body: Processed Karnif Meat;A delicacy for Munin. (Q5015)

string.name: STR_DIC_QILA181
string.body: For test';Test data to check how punctuation marks behave in the data.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1020A
string.body: Seal of Kuninasha;Kuninasha's treasure which is known to be harbored inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_14] growing deep in the Kraka's Den </br>You can destroy an Abyss Gate with it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_1152_peper
string.body: Verteron Pepper;A specialty of the Verteron region, which can be purchased from the food merchant [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Drasia] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_1160_all
string.body: Stolen Accessories;the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_1160a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_1160b] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_1160c] stolen by the Kobolds of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_1160a
string.body: Naia's Bracelet;A silver bracelet stolen by the Dukaki Bruiser of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_1160b
string.body: Naia's Necklace;A necklace stolen by the Dukaki Watcher of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_1160c
string.body: Naia's Ring;It's in the possession of the Kobold cookworking for the Dukaki tribe east of the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2104a
string.body: Sprigg Fruit;Fruit hidden by Spriggs in several places around Aldelle hill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2105a
string.body: Glowing Sphere;The glowing orb from the tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_spakyD_1_n] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakleD_1_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2106a
string.body: Bundle of Orders;It contains the orders written by Vanar. There's also a Sprigg fruit snack.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2107a
string.body: Letter;A scroll bound tightly with a string. Ulgorn's name is written on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2108a
string.body: Slink Oil;The oil of a Web Slink. It is used to polish cubes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2109a
string.body: Ampreh Flower;An attractive blossom of the beautiful flower growing in Lake Tunapre.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2110a
string.body: Kaindal's Note;A letter from Kaindal to Motgar.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2111a
string.body: Shepherd's Rod;A long rod used to herd animals.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2112a
string.body: Airon Breast Feather;The breast feather of Blackbeak Airon. It is downy soft and often used for quilted clothes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2113a
string.body: Shiny Silver Ring;A shining ring with 'To my love Dabi' engraved on the inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2115a
string.body: Sap Bottle;It contains sap from the trees in the Munihele forest.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2116a
string.body: Treasure Map;A map showing the location of the Black Opal, a treasure sought by the sailors of Eyvindr.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2118a
string.body: Pirate's Journal;Found on the body of a sailor of Eyvindr, it is the journal of the Rossio Pirates, who went searching for the Black Opal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2119a
string.body: Black Opal;A gem sought by the Eyvindr sailors. It is said that the Opal's owner can change their fate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2120a
string.body: Brax Skin;Taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BraxD_5_n] or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BraxBabyD_5_n]. It's thick and warm, though the hair is a bit wiry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2121a
string.body: Whetstone;An item Mijou asked you to take to Delle. Used to sharpen blades.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2122a
string.body: Silver Necklace;Faded silver necklace. It has a pendant engraved with 'Prison Sentinel Crypto'.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2123a
string.body: Ginseng Root;It is difficult to find it as it is a very elusive plant. The easiest way to get it is to rob [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WormbabyD_10_An]s of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2123b
string.body: Methu Egg;The egg of a Methu tended by a Dundun Looklook in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_8]. Generally considered a delicacy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2123c
string.body: Sparkie Eggs;The eggs of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_spakyD_6_n]. They are known to be a delicacy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2124a
string.body: Sparkle Leg;The leg of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakleD_7_n]. It is good for leg pains.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2124b
string.body: Ampha Thorn;The thorn of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WormbabyD_7_An]. It is good for leg pains.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2124c
string.body: Leg Pain Killer Ingredient;Indicates [%dic:STR_DIC_I_2124a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_2124b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2126a
string.body: Odella Juice;Fermented Odella juice. It smells good and is used to make alcoholic drinks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2127a
string.body: Mau Adornment;An accessory made from Citrin ore. It can be sold at a high price.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2128a
string.body: Dried Ginseng Root;A preserved root segment. Regular consumption of ginseng revitalizes the body.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2115b
string.body: Thick Leather;Well tanned, thick leather.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_k_s_13d
string.body: Dukaki Amulet;Wooden amulets of various shapes. You can obtain them from the Kobolds in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA13].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_v_s_09d
string.body: Lepharist Crest;The crest worn by those occupying [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24]. A skull is drawn on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_l_s_16d
string.body: Krall Ration;Rations of the Tursin Krall. The rations reek too much to eat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1949a
string.body: Ksellid Whisker;Whiskers of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Shellizard_33_An], rumored to be very nutritious. It's very much in demand.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1934a
string.body: Body Tissue;Body tissues collected from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ID5R_PerfectWaBossQ_45_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1932a
string.body: Crystal Studded Headband;A headband given to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparFigNamedQ_38_Ae] by Thersites when they were in love.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1930A
string.body: Feather of Fire;A mysterious feather obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_NPC_Griffonix].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1930B
string.body: Magma Essence;A molten mass obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalFire3_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1930C
string.body: Burning Barghest Tail;The warm tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Hellhound_39_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_herb_n_c_10a
string.body: Aria;An herb that grows well in dense forests. You can get them easily in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA04].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_SHELL_10A
string.body: Inina;A food ingredient. There are many in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_noblemetal_10a
string.body: Silver Ore;Ore buried in the [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA12]. It is difficult to find.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_vegetable_n_c_10a
string.body: Kukuru;An annual vine of the gourd family growing in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA24]. It looks similar to a pumpkin and has a variety of uses.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2001B
string.body: Sprigg Grain;Grains stored by Spriggs in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_9]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2002A
string.body: Spore Pouch;The spore pouch of a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_10]. It generally stores spell components.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2003A
string.body: Dead Folks' Stuff;A precious item carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GhostD_7_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2004a
string.body: Charmed Cube;A cube carried by the ghost in the Ishalgen Prison. It's supposed to be quite an expensive item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2004b
string.body: Sparkle Luciferin;The fluorescent tail of a Sparkie.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2005A
string.body: Odella;An herb which grows by consuming Aetheric energy. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WormbabyD_8_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2006A
string.body: Mau Grain;Grains contained in [%dic:STR_DIC_E_11]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_herb_n_c_10a2
string.body: Iron Ore;Ore which is used to make weapons or magical materials. You can mine it in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_8], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_9], or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_3].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_TREE_10A
string.body: Betua Log;Tough Betua Wood is harvested from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_herb_d_n_c_10a
string.body: Azpha;An herb that grows well in dense forests. It is widely distributed near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_3], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_7] and other areas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2013A
string.body: Flint;A flint that Loriniah gave you. It is used to set fire to the Odella wagons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2013B
string.body: Hairpin;A head accessory for the MuMu and the Black Claw tribes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2013C
string.body: Sturdy Leather Belt;A Belt worn by the MuMu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_2014A
string.body: Lepharist Primer;A secret document of the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2015A
string.body: Komu's Horn;The horn of Komu Silverclaw, the alpha Mosbear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2016A
string.body: Arachna Poison Sac;A poison sac you can obtain by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_OctasideD_15_An] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_11].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2016B
string.body: Shania's Poison Potion;A poison that Shania made by mixing Arachna poison with other substances.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2017A
string.body: Tiamat's Sword;A sword dropped by the Balaur Brigade General during the Millennium War. It was once owned by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2018A
string.body: Umkata's Bones;Shards of Umkata's skeleton needed to awaken his ghost. Carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_18_Ae]s or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_17_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2018B
string.body: Umkata's Earrings;It can wake up Umkata. It is said that it was placed within [%dic:STR_DIC_E_20] and hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2018C
string.body: Umkata's Weapon;It can wake up Umkata. It is said that it was stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental1stD_18_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental2ndD_18_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2019A
string.body: Sledgehammer Heads;To be used in the reconstruction of Impetusium. You need to deliver it to Banatisai.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2020A
string.body: Shaman's Staff;A staff used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanSNamed_19_Ae] of the Black Claw tribe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2021A
string.body: Malodor Thorn;A thorn of a Swamp Malodor. It is used as an ingredient of a transformation potion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2021B
string.body: Zemurru's Totem;A totem found in the Black Claw Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2022A
string.body: Naga Seal;A seal engraved with the pattern of Balaur. It is needed when closing the Abyss Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2203a
string.body: Altgard Crystal;A crystal which can be obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_17]s of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2]. It contains a lot of Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2204a
string.body: Sparkie Sap;The slimy sap of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakyD_10_n]. It can be used in making detergents by mixing it with herbal powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2205a
string.body: Airon Meat;The breast meat of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HiivD_10_n]. It tastes good and is many recipes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2206a
string.body: Slink Tail;You can obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_lepismaD_10_n]s living near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2208a
string.body: Mau Secret Remedy;A potion which enables one to speak the language of the Mau. Your talkage may vary.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2209a
string.body: Treasure House of Knowledge;A book containing knowledge of various fields. There are a lot of notes scribbled in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2212a
string.body: Tog Rib;A rib from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_TogD_11_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2213a
string.body: Okaru Fruit;The fruit from an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_23]. It's highly venomous, but can be used as an ingredient for medicine when properly prepared.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2214a
string.body: Pluma Feather;The tail feather of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_lupylliniD_10_n]. The end is strong and sharp so it is often used as a quill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2216a
string.body: MuMu Grass Knot;A knot found in the MuMu Farmland. The grass is rather intricately knotted, giving the impression that it has a special meaning.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2216b
string.body: Crystal;Crystal

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2216c
string.body: Crystal;Crystal

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2217a
string.body: Olenja's Letter;A letter from Olenja to Gefion. It bulges as it contains a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2216a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2218a
string.body: Frightcorn Seed;The seed of a Frightcorn plant. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererM_11_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_11_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_13_An]s have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2219a
string.body: Ripened Frightcorn Stem;The stem of a Frightcorn that grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_17].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2219b
string.body: Ripened Frightcorn;Frightcorn picked from a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2219a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2221a
string.body: Wooden Safe;A safe in which Groken stores precious items. Apparently, he had hidden it somewhere behind the house.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_2222a
string.body: Manir's Letter;A letter from Manir to Karl.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2223a
string.body: Bundle of Incense;Incense that Lamir picked up at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_10]. Apparently, burning the incense in the censer on the altar conjures a monster.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2224a
string.body: Mosbear Leather;The hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearBaby_13_An], a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearBaby_14_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearBaby_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_13_An], or a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_14_An]. It's soft and warm, and is often used to make shoes or thick coats.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2226a
string.body: Memory Quartz;A quartz made by Garuntat. It can restore lost memories.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2227a
string.body: Spirit Crystal;The crystal of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WElemental1stD_13_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2228a
string.body: Tanning Knife;A knife that was once stuck in a Mosbear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2229a
string.body: Weapon Box;A box brought from the wagon in front of the Grave Robber's Den.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2230a
string.body: Mosbear Tusks;Sharp tusks that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_13_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_14_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Mosbear_13_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Mosbear_14_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Mosbear_15_An] have.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2232a
string.body: Beehive;A beehive in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_11]. Bee swarms will attack if it is disturbed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2236a
string.body: MuMu Hairpin;A peculiarly shaped hairpin worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanHair_15_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererM_15_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2237a
string.body: MuMu Fertilizer Bag;A bag full of fertilizer. You can get it in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2238a
string.body: MuMu Belt;The Belt worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_15_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanScoutM_15_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2239a
string.body: Ampha Membrane;Thin and tough skin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WormBabyD_15_An]. It can be used to make an antidote against Malodor poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2239b
string.body: Ampha Antidote;Antidote made of Ampha membrane. It is used to counteract Malodor poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2241a
string.body: Shiny Mushroom;A mushroom that grows in Gribade Canyon. It is popular for food and medicinal purposes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2242a
string.body: Small Charm;An elaborately crafted charm. Its use is unknown.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2246a
string.body: Gerger Insignia;An insignia that Germir dropped in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_22].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2247a
string.body: Shugo Clothes;Clothes for someone very small. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF1_13] has them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2248a
string.body: Gemyu's Package;A package containing letters written by Gemyu. You should deliver it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF1_6] in the Traders' Airship Dock.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2249a
string.body: Angolem Crystal;A stone obtained from Angolems. You can obtain it by killing the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SouledstoneD_17_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SouledstonebabyD_17_An]s found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA200] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2250a
string.body: Scolopen Poison Stinger;The tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ScorpionD_17_An]. It is so venomous that it can kill people instantly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2251a
string.body: Pecku Tail Feather;The tail feather of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CockatriceD_18_An_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2252a
string.body: Bone of Mahisha;The bone of a cruel drake who lived in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2253a
string.body: Crystal Hand Mirror;A luxurious hand mirror made of crystal. Chagarinerk wants to give it to Mahirinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2254a
string.body: Soul Essence;A crystal containing the essence of a soul. You can obtain them by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadD_18_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadDWiz_18_An]s wandering in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2257a
string.body: Metallic Fragment;It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_24].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2258a
string.body: Ancient Gold Coin;An ancient gold coin discovered in Impetusium. It is engraved with mysterious sigils.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2259a
string.body: Wild Tayga Fang;A sharp fang from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DireBeast_18_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2262a
string.body: Japayerk's Package;Package which [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF1_3] asked you to deliver to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF1_9].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2263a
string.body: Malodor Pollen;Pollen from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RafflesiaD_16_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RafflesiaD_17_An]. It is used to make potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2265a
string.body: Archon Sword;A sword that Dellalont was robbed of by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanFighterS_17_An]s in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_15]. Its handle is engraved with Dellalont's name.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_2266a
string.body: Brigade General's Orders;An order that Brigade General Suthran wrote to Neifenmer of the Altgard Observatory.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_2269a
string.body: Lepharist Folio;It was found in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_29]. It is encrypted.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2270a
string.body: Lepharist Insignia;It was once worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparWaD_17_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparPriestD_17_An]s. It is engraved with flame shapes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2271a
string.body: Aurtri's Letter;A letter from Aurtri to Brigade General Suthran.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2272a
string.body: Taora's Cube;A cube [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanSeekerS_16_An] took away. It contains various items.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2273a
string.body: Emergency Provisions;They were stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanScoutM_17_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_17_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2274a
string.body: Chieftain's Baton;A rod made of animal bone and engraved with symbols.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2275a
string.body: Black Claw Amulet;A wooden amulet carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_16_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_17_An]s. It has unusual markings etched into it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2276a
string.body: Black Claw Gargoyle;A peculiarly shaped statue carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanS_17_Ae]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2277a
string.body: Mau Feather Trinket;A feathered accessory worn by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_16_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2278a
string.body: Suthran's Letter;A letter from Brigade General Suthran to Cavalorn of Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2283a
string.body: Suthran's Report;A report that Brigade General Suthran sends to Governor Vidar of Pandaemonimum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_RING_D_N_C_16C
string.body: Passion Ring;The wedding rings worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife_16_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife4_16_An] signifying their marriage to the MuMu chieftain Manumumu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_RING_D_N_C_16D
string.body: Jealousy Ring;The wedding rings worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife2_16_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife5_16_An] signifying their marriage to the MuMu chieftain Manumumu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_RING_D_N_C_16E
string.body: Love Ring;The wedding rings worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife3_16_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanChiefWife6_16_An] signifying their marriage to the MuMu chieftain Manumumu.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1303a
string.body: Pluma Tail Feather;The tail feather of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_lupyllini_19_n]. It is sleek and vibrant.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1307a
string.body: Jewel Ring;A ring that may have been stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ManduriT_21_An]s or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ManduriB_21_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1307b
string.body: Clothing Package;A package of clothes that may have been stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ManduriT_21_An]s or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ManduriB_21_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_1309a
string.body: Old Diary;A book written with charcoal. The letters are too smudged to read. Perhaps someone can restore it?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1310a
string.body: Seed of Long-branch Creeper Log;A seedpod.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1311a
string.body: Sapling;A Daeva's needed to plant them because their environment is particularly threatening.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1317a
string.body: Kerubian Horn;A small horn from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim2_23_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1322a
string.body: Medicine of Life;An Elim fruit which has various effects including hastening the growth of living organisms.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1323a
string.body: Jewel Box;A jewel box someone may have lost. It rattles when shaken.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1324a
string.body: Malonimus' Orders;Written orders from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Maximianus] to a Sentinel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1326a
string.body: Plump Pincers;Pincers from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lobster_25_An]. They are considered a delicacy in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1327a
string.body: Caryatid Fragment;Stone shard from a Caryatid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1329a
string.body: Soft Drink;It is a fizzy, cold drink.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1333a
string.body: Drake Horn;A horn on the head of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Bonedrake_26_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1334a
string.body: Flame Essence;Flame energy that can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalFire2_26_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1337a
string.body: Flame Stone;LF2 quest item

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1341a
string.body: Scolopen Pincers;Pincers which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Scorpion_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1341b
string.body: Basilisk Fang;A sharp fang which can be obtained by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Basilisk_28_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1342a
string.body: Ksellid Shell;A shell of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Shellizard_29_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardBaby_30_An]. It is bumpy and very hard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_1344a
string.body: Report for Castor;A report from the Scout Band dispatched to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1345a
string.body: Ring;Probably won't rule anything, much less everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1351a
string.body: Black Stone;A black stone piece which can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_4C_Gargoyle_30_Ae]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1356a
string.body: Strange Stone Piece;A stone with strange, shining colors which was picked up in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1358a
string.body: Spring Water Essence;A Spirit Essence that you can get by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalWater2_28_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1359a
string.body: Brirunyerk's Package;Things packed by Brirunyerk in a sheet. The package contains [%dic:STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_1358a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1361a
string.body: Bucket Full of Spring Water;Fresh from the Mystic Spring of Anathe.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_1359c
string.body: Seventh Page of a Diary;Part of a diary found inside [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_KI]. It may have been intentionally torn off by someone.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1361b
string.body: Full Bucket;Rather sloshy and heavy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1362a

string.body: Kalsek Claw;The claw of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DireBeastDNamedQ_22_An]. It is hook-shaped and very sharp.
