string.body: Daru Brisket;The breast meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DaruD_21_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2307b
string.body: Crasaur Flipper;A thick flipper from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PhainiD_22_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2307c
string.body: Worg Thigh Meat;The thigh meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Zaif2D_21_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2307d
string.body: Tender Hock Meat;The hind leg meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DaruD_21_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2311a
string.body: Red Wing;The wing of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaD_21_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2323a
string.body: Clodworm Leather;The white leathery skin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ClodwormD_25_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ClodwormD_27_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2323b
string.body: Stone Grave Thorn;Thick, sharp thorns on the back of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MimicRe2D_25_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MimicRe2D_27_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2323c
string.body: Sheluk Foreleg;The prickly foreleg of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShelukD_26_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShelukD_27_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2325a
string.body: Bone Speaks;A popular novel in Pandaemonium. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardNamedDQ_25_An] swallowed it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2333a
string.body: Big Bucket;A bucket carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparWizardD_27_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334a
string.body: Dorado;Fish inhabiting in the lake located in the Salintus Desert. You can obtain it by essencetapping.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334b
string.body: Ksellid Raw Meat;You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardD_27_An] in the Salintus Desert.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334c
string.body: Briga Powder;A food made by grinding slightly dried Briga. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daraia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334d
string.body: Hot Spice;A spice that is used to add a spicy, hot taste to food. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daraia] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334all
string.body: Food Ingredients;Ingredients that Orashunerk needs to make a new dish. Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334c], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2334d].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2504
string.body: Cheese;A food made by fermenting milk. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daraia] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2340a
string.body: Fresh Ginseng;Ginseng that the Munmun Tribe cultivates. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FnC_RatmanGathererM_28_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorD_28_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanScoutD_28_An]s have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2345b
string.body: Ginseng Cookie;Cookies made by boiling dried ginseng with sugar.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2345c
string.body: Ginseng Tea;Tea made by boiling herbs and dried ginseng together.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2356a
string.body: Spiner Stone;The hard shell of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LobsterReD_27_An]. Some people mistake it for a stone since it is round and solid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2359a
string.body: Oculazen Iris;The eye of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FlyingEyeD_28_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2361a
string.body: Elim Fruit;The fruit that Elim bear once in several decades or centuries. Strangely, this is burnt a little on the outside.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2362a
string.body: Basilisk Scale;The rough scale of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BasiliskD_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2362b
string.body: Flame Fin;The fin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BasiliskD_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2381a
string.body: Tripeed Fruit;A fruit you can pick in [%dic:STR_DIC_DF2_2382_Trifid]. There are some seeds in it that are used in the making of traps and poisons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2386a
string.body: Spriggan Back Skin;The back skin from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg2_32_An]. It is used for winter clothing since it is thin but warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2387a
string.body: Gorgon Horn;The horn from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GorgonRe_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2389a
string.body: Crestlich Beak;A beak you can obtain by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CrestlichReD_33_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CrestlichReD_35_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2401a
string.body: Scolopen Poison;Poison that can be extracted from the tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ScorpionDF2_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2412a
string.body: Soil Spirit Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth2D_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2412b
string.body: Earth Spirit Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth3D_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2412c
string.body: Terra Elemental Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth4D_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2413a
string.body: Water Spirit Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalWater2D_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2413b
string.body: Lake Spirit Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalWater3D_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2413c
string.body: Mist Spirit Stone;Essence of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalWater4D_37_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2416a
string.body: Abex Sirloin;The sirloin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FethlotNmD_36_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2416b
string.body: Sparkle Wings;The wings of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakleD_35_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2442a
string.body: Odella Pill;Pills made by concentrating the Odella cultivated by the Nunu tribe. Found on [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ReC_LycanRangerM_40_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeB_LycanKnightM_38_Ae]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2312a
string.body: Sylphen Leg;The leg of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaD_23_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2328a
string.body: Tentacle;A tentacle from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CentipedeNamedQ_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2332a
string.body: Buffalid Neck Meat;The meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HexiggD_26_An]. It is quite fatty.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2332b
string.body: Snuffler Sirloin;The sirloin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_merdionD_25_n]. You need 5 points to cook it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2332c
string.body: Kurin Thigh Meat;The thigh meat from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CuresD_25_An]. You need 2 points to use it as a food ingredient.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2343a
string.body: Ginseng-shaped Incense;A flat incense that resembles ginseng.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2346a
string.body: Odella String;String belonging to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LycanKnightM_28_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AeA_LycanAssassinM_29_Ae]s. It is made by twisting dried Odella tightly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2364a
string.body: Agrint Essence;Essence of Elim Magni.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2367a
string.body: Shugo Tailring;An accessory that Shugos wear on their tails.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2371a
string.body: Power Crystal;A blue stone embedded in the body of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SouledstoneDReD_33_Ae] in the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2371b
string.body: Magic Power Crystal;A red stone embedded in the body of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SouledstoneAReD_33_Ae] in the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2372a
string.body: Long Arachna Leg;The long leg of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_OctasideD_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2372b
string.body: Heart of Flame;A hard lump that can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2372]s. It holds the energy of flames.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2372c
string.body: Pungent Liquor;A liquor made of [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2372a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2372b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2373a
string.body: Ancient Weapon;A weapon the Kromede the Corrupt is coveting. It is located deep inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toDF2_DFlame].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2384a
string.body: Gauze Bandage;Bandage that Sarinerk lost. You can get it by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HellhoundD_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2384b
string.body: Prex Bandage;Bandage that Sarinerk lost. You can get it by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SuccubusGuard_30_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2384c
string.body: Compress;Compress that Sarinerk lost. You can get it by killing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MaidengolemD_30_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2392a
string.body: Green Virago Feather;The wing feather of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HarpyD_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2392b
string.body: Dark Red Crestlich Feather;The tail feather of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CrestlichReD_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2392c
string.body: White Pecku Mane;The mane of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CockatriceD_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2393a
string.body: Empty Flask;Kamer's Flask.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2431a
string.body: Sheluk Poison;The poison from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShelukD_37_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShelukD_38_An]s. Its poison is so potent that just one drop can paralyze a humanoid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2452a
string.body: Mosbear Fluid;It can neutralize unclassified poison to a certain extent. You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearS_37_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302a
string.body: Opal Necklace;The necklace that Frenai lost. You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_lupylliniD_19_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302b
string.body: Sapphire Ring;The ring that Frenai lost. You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PhainiD_19_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302c
string.body: Pearl Earrings;The earrings that Frenai lost. You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_lepismaD_19_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302all
string.body: Accessories;The [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2302c] that Frenai lost.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2391a
string.body: Rynoce Horn;The big horn of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RhinoceDF2_34_An]. It is highly prized as a material for armor and weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2407a
string.body: Construction Blueprint;A blueprint showing the whole of the Lepharist complex. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparAsNamedDQ_40_Ae] carries it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2353a
string.body: Amethyst;A violet gemstone that can be extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Crystal_Q2353].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2423a
string.body: Sparkle Spawner;The spawner you obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Spakle_19_n]. An oddly sweet smell wafts from the pouch.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2425a
string.body: Arachna Poison;The poison of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_OctasideD_23_An]. The strength of the poison is weak. It is mainly used for research.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2427a
string.body: Potion Bottle;A bottle of liquid medicine. It is contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_WoodenBox_Q2427].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2427b
string.body: Research Materials;Various materials used in the development of a new medicines. They are contained inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF2_Barrel_Q2427].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2429a
string.body: Crasaur Leather;The smooth, thick hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PhainiD_22_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2429b
string.body: Brax Skin;The hide of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BraxD_21_n]. It is covered with soft, short hairs.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2476a
string.body: Clodworm Tail;The tail you obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ClodwormRe2D_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2477a
string.body: Lean Crestlich Ribs;The lean ribs of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CrestlichReD_29_n] known for its good taste. They can be found only in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478a
string.body: Gnarl Stump;The tree stump you can get from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Xipeto_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478b
string.body: Scolopen Meat;The meat you obtained by hunting [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Scorpion_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478c
string.body: Ksellid Hock Meat;The hind leg meat cut from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Shellizard_30_An] that you hunted.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478all
string.body: Ingredients for Kselopen Sausage;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2478c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2430a
string.body: Holy Pendant;A thick-chained necklace that has a hanging medal with a wing-shaped engraving. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DaruD_21_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2494a
string.body: Magic Earrings;Earrings that have a flame shape engraved on a thin, gold plate. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg3NamedDQA_24_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2494b
string.body: Red Heart Necklace;A necklace of silver with a dark red jewel hanging from it. It is worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg3NamedDQB_25_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2494c
string.body: Dragon Blood Bracelet;A bracelet of red beads threaded together. It is in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg3NamedDQC_25_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2446a
string.body: Nunu Fertilizer;A dark mass contained in a small sack. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FnC_RatmanGathererM_38_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FnA_RatmanWarriorM_38_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FnB_RatmanWarriorM_38_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FnB_RatmanWarriorM_40_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RnA_RatmanScoutM_38_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RnA_RatmanScoutM_38_An_2]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2497a
string.body: Fishing Bait;The bait contained in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_ToolBox_Q2497].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1461a
string.body: Vespine Poison Stinger;The poisonous stinger of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_VespaNamed_23_n]. The end of it is hook-shaped.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1461b
string.body: Purple Membrane;A thin purple membrane enveloping the skin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Debrie_16_n]. It is dangerous to touch as the whole membrane is infused with poison.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1462a
string.body: Arachna Poison Gland;The poison sac of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_OctasideD_22_An]. Squeezing it yields a transparent liquid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1473a
string.body: Tayga Armor;The armor worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PetA_DireBeastSD_38_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PetA_DireBeastSD_40_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PetB_DireBeastSD_39_An]s. It is studded with pointy metal spikes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1353a
string.body: Kselliki Meat;The soft meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardBaby_28_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardBabyL_28_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardBaby_30_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ShellizardBabyL_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2481a
string.body: Caryatid Piece;A broken piece of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Maidengolem_26_An] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_G1]. The stone is gray and glossy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2483a
string.body: Daeva's Soul;The soul of a Daeva who lost his sense of self after being transformed into an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Shellizard_33_An] for too long. You feel a hot sensation when you hold it in your hands.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2487a
string.body: Pretor Cell Tissue;The skin tissue of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Pretor_38_An]. It is of brownish-green hue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2487b
string.body: Pretor Research Diary;A book somewhere in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_J]. An in-depth record of the Pretor discoveries, sorted by date.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2034h
string.body: Abex Meat;The juicy meat of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FethlotNmD_28_n]. When it is roasted on the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_OBJ_DF2_FOBJ_Q2034] a Tayga appears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2032c
string.body: Tranquility Powder;A mixture of various herbal powders. Sprinkling it on the ground between the two pillars of the tower at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_2] can console the Spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1722a
string.body: Eltnen Sunset;A perfume with fragrances of the green trees, hot air of the plains, sweet fruits, and moist earth. You can only get it in Eltnen.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1737a
string.body: Guardian General's Helmet;You can get it by defeating the Guardian Generals of the Siel's Western Fortress, the Siel's Eastern Fortress, or the Sulfur Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1739a
string.body: Guardian General's Sword;You can get it by defeating the Guardian Generals that guard the Reshanta Top Fortresses.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1771a
string.body: Worn Sword;Its blade is dull and the engravings on the handle have also faded away. You can acquire it by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_Skeleton_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1771b
string.body: Broken Sword;It is broken in half and only the handle remains. You can obtain it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_SkeletonB_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1771c
string.body: Intact Sword;It looks all right at first, but the blade is too dull to be wielded. You can acquire it by destroying a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_SkeletonC_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1772a
string.body: Bright Marble;A marble carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_SouledStoneB_30_An]s. It glows in a different color each time the direction is changed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1730a
string.body: Bracer;A leather wrist guard worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1131_Skeleton_25_An]s. It is of a thick leather and latches with a buckle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1776a
string.body: Gilt-patterned Bottle;A wine bottle contained inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_small_box]. It is a glass wine bottle covered with gilt patterns.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1778a
string.body: Archon Epaulet's;A splendid epaulet decorated with jewels. It is worn by the Asmodian fighters [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dullaha], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Greip], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rota].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1731a
string.body: Hard Bone;The shin bone of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1131_Skeleton_25_An]. It is hard and heavy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1749a
string.body: Fortress Protector's Mark;A small epaulet embroidered with a trapezoid shape. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_title_1749] in the Siel's Eastern Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1751a
string.body: Viscous Fluid;The fluid of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_Flyingeye_27_An]. A slippery mucus with a moldy smell.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1751b
string.body: Hoverstone Core;The core of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_FungyB_29_An]. Yellow granules are scattered on the black stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1758a
string.body: Mark of Red Hasia;A badge with a small flower made of gold. It is worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Asynja], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gagnrad], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Glati].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1796a
string.body: Griffon Egg;The egg you can obtain by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Griffon_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1796b
string.body: Crynac Salivary Gland;The salivary gland of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Criton_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1759a
string.body: Guard's Insignia;A small epaulet embroidered with a branch. It is worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SulfurTree_Guard]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1762a
string.body: Hazy Metal Plate;The crystal of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Elementalwater3_30_An]. It is difficult to see, but you can feel something cold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1762b
string.body: Hazy String;The tentacle of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_WaterWorm_30_An]. It is difficult to see, but you can feel something thin and tough.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1763a
string.body: Translucent Metal;The crystal of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_ElementalAir4_32_An]. You can vaguely see the other side of this cold metallic object.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1763b
string.body: Translucent String;The tentacle of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_WaterWorm_30_An]. You can't really see it if you don't look carefully enough.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1764a
string.body: Trico Horn;The hard horn of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Tricorn_31_An]. It has patterns very much like a tree's annual rings.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1764b
string.body: Immortal Pluma Feather;The neck feather of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_lupyllini_31_An]. It is brightly colored and soft.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1764c
string.body: Granker Horn;The horn of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Giantdeer_31_An]. The end is forked.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1781a
string.body: Klaw Wing;The wings of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_NeutL2_38_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_NeutL2_39_An]s. It looks like a thin ellipsoid plate of brown color.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1781b
string.body: Klaw Leg;The legs of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_NeutH2_38_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_NeutH2_39_An]s. It is thin and pointed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1784a
string.body: Crest of Pandaemonium;The crest worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rathgrid], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Laufey], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Goinn], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Modir], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lodurr]. It is embroidered with the wings of Asmodians, shield, sword and others.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1786a
string.body: Draconute Weapon;The Balaur weapons taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_LizardmanFi_39_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_LizardmanRa_39_An]. Its surface is bumpy and of blood-red color.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1789a
string.body: Supply Box;A wooden chest containing weapons and food. You can get it by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Menglad], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Modsognir], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Reginlief], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Moinn] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Geri].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1794a
string.body: Operation Order;A written order carried by the Red Hasia Legionaries [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rossjof], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Grid], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lofn], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lifprasir] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Magnair], who are on the Drakenwreck.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1801a
string.body: Wing Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1801_all]s. It is embroidered with black wing patterns.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1802a
string.body: Insignia of Reshanta;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1802_all]s. It is embroidered with flame shapes of geometric patterns.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1803a
string.body: Fortress Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1803_all]s. It is engraved with a castle gate and spears crossing each other.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1804a
string.body: Insignia of Azphel;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1804_all]s. It is engraved with the symbol of Azphel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1805a
string.body: Tree Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1805_all]s. It is engraved with the simple shape of a tree.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1806a
string.body: Thorny Vine Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1806_all]s. It is in the shape of a shield, and is engraved with thorny vines.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1807a
string.body: Archon Weapon;The weapons carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1807_all]s. The name of their Legion is inscribed on the handle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1808a
string.body: Archon Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1808_all]s. It is engraved with the wings of an Asmodian and the form of a helmet.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1809a
string.body: Archon's Hairpin;The hairpin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1809_all]s who appear when the fortress battle is activated. It is engraved with delicate feather patterns.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1810a
string.body: Archon Kisk;The Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1810_all]s. It has a purple wing attached on top.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1811a
string.body: Archon Cloak;A red cloak worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1811_all]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1812a
string.body: Archon Flag;A flag held by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1812_all]. Asmodian wings and helmets are drawn on the red cloth.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1813a
string.body: Kysis Archon Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1813_all]s. It has a small pin so the insignia can be attached to clothing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1814a
string.body: Kysis Archon Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1814_all]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1815a
string.body: Miren Archon Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1815_all]s. A shield and sword is embroidered on it in red thread.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1816a
string.body: Miren Archon Kisk;The Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_1816_all]s. A purple wing is attached to it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1819a
string.body: Cannibal Worm Sap;The sticky sap of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_Worm_28_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_WormB_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1820a
string.body: Small Undamaged Horn;Of all Asteria Tricos with big horns, only [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Trico_31_An] has this small horn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1821a
string.body: Life Crystal;A small crystal you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_Maidengolem_30_An] that vanished in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1822a
string.body: Starving Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1823a
string.body: Greedy Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1824a
string.body: Ravenous Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1241_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1825a
string.body: Aether's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsOd_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1825b
string.body: Fire's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsFire_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1825c
string.body: Core of Ancient Defender;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_BoneDrake_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1825d
string.body: Nature's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1825all
string.body: Defender's Core;The cores of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsOd_50_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsFire_50_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_BoneDrake_50_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An] that you obtained by defeating each of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1826a
string.body: Light's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_LightGuardian_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1826b
string.body: Shadow's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_DarkGuardian_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1743a
string.body: Ancient Ring;A ring worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1131_Graveknight_25_An]s. It is engraved with the emblem of ancient Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1744a
string.body: Green Mineral;Crystals embedded into [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1131_SouledStoneB_26_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1131_SouledStone_25_An]s. It emits a soft glow.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1746a
string.body: Sentinel's Mark;A badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_title_1746]. It looks like two layers of wings stacked on top of the other.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1748a
string.body: Insignia of Destruction;Insignias worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Amundi], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gefjun], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bui], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Helfrid], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ogmund]. A whirlpool pattern is carved on a small metal plate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1971a
string.body: Vespine Ichor;The fluid of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Vespa_22_n] that has a very deep green color.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1971b
string.body: Stinky Sap;Sap extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ClodwormRe2_21_An]. It is sticky and transparent, and stinks a lot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2722a
string.body: Alsig Special Wine;A unique wine with a tangy bouquet. Very unpretentious.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2760a
string.body: Red Hasia Insignia;An insignia embroidered with a red flower. It was seized by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2760_all]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2761a
string.body: Mysterious Crystal;The crystal of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Elementalwater3_30_An]. It is cube-shaped and looks like a mineral ore.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2762a
string.body: Transparent Tentacle;A protruded part of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_WaterWorm_30_An]s. It is transparent, but feels pointy to the touch.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2765a
string.body: Fearful Spirit Shard;A fragment of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_ShadowStalker_34_An]s. It is black and wriggles in your hand.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2766a
string.body: Skull Buckle;A waist buckle worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Skeleton_34_An]s. It is in the shape of a small skull.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2772a
string.body: Seal of the Ancient City;An ornate seal engraved with the emblem of Roah. It is said to be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_jewelbox_Q1776].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2774a
string.body: Crystal Wardstone;The crystal inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_SAM_30_An]. The surface is smooth.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2775a
string.body: Contaminated Crystal Wardstone;The crystal inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_SAMB_32_An]. The surface has holes drilled through, and is olivine-black.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2781a
string.body: Klaw Shell;The shell of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Neut_all]s. It is almost as hard as a metal

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2784a
string.body: Guardian Crest;An emblem engraved on the epaulets of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Menelaus], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lyaeus], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Myrrha], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Leager], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mors]. It is embroidered with the wings of an Elyos and a sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2788a
string.body: Thick Drake Leather;The belly skin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_drake_39_An]s. It is bronze in color, and is soft to the touch.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2788b
string.body: Thin Drake Leather;The back skin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_drakeB_39_An]. It is a very thin, brilliant red leather.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2789a
string.body: Guardian's Cloak Fragment;A piece of the yellow cloaks worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bellona], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Battus], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Luptinai], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bromius], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vergil].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2791a
string.body: Flame Tribe Horn;The horn on the head of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1241_Tauric_38_An]. It is hard and pointed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2791b
string.body: Ravenous Hearts;The heart of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1241_Pretor_38_An]. It is as hard as stone.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2793a
string.body: Dredgion Salvage;[%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_Module_Q1793]. It is a red metallic substance.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2794a
string.body: Temple Crest;A small badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Monerva], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Metis], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Baucis], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Belus], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Sarpedon]. It is engraved with a pattern of crossed swords in front of a building.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_co_12a
string.body: Salix Oil;A vegetable oil sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daraia], a food merchant in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_first_aid_30a
string.body: Greater Odella Powder;The Odella powder sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nekai], a general goods merchant in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2964a
string.body: Lepharist Insignia;A badge engraved with a flame shape.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2728a
string.body: Elyos Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Labdacus]. It is embroidered with a gleaming Tower of Eternity.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2741a
string.body: Trace of Soul;A fragment of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1132_Specter_25_An]. It is milky white.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2744a
string.body: Blue Crystal Golem Fragment;A fragment of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1132_SouledStone_25_An]. It glows in dark blue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2744b
string.body: Evolved Golem Fragment;A fragment of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1132_SouledStoneB_25_An]. It is semi-transparent and glows in light blue.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2746a
string.body: Protector's Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2746_all]s. It is embroidered with closed castle gates.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2751a
string.body: Lump of Flame;A small stone emitting heat. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_FungyA_27_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_FungyB_27_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2752a
string.body: Crimson Iris;The red eye of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_Flyingeye_27_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2754a
string.body: Naga's Staff;The staff of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_NagaWizard_28_An]. It looks like a gnarled branch adorned with a blue crystal.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2797a
string.body: Dragon Rib;The biggest rib among the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_OldDragonBone_Q2797]. A lot of magic power is still left within it, as it is closest to the dragon's heart.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2801a
string.body: Guardian's Insignia;A badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2801_all]s. It is engraved with the wings of an Elyos and a sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2802a
string.body: Light Insignia;A badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2802_all]s. It is engraved with the shape of irradiating rays of light.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2803a
string.body: Guardian's Hairpin;The hairpin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2803_all]s. It is engraved with leaf shapes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2804a
string.body: Noble Insignia;A golden badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2804_all]s. It is elaborately engraved with flame patterns.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2805a
string.body: Guardian Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2805_all]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2806a
string.body: Heirophant Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2806_all]s. The handle is engraved with a pattern of blooming vines.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2807a
string.body: Asteria Guardian's Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2807_all]s. The handle is engraved with the wielder's name.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2808a
string.body: Aether-studded Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2808_all]s. The handle is studded with transparent pieces of Aether.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2809a
string.body: Guardian's Epaulet;The epaulet of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2809_all]s. Small protrusions cover the surface.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2810a
string.body: Guardian's Kisk;The Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2810_all]s. It's engraved with the image of a lady with bluish-green wings.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2811a
string.body: Guardian's Cloak;A yellow cloak worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2811_all]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2812a
string.body: Krotan Refuge Flag;A flag held by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2812_all]s. Ornate orange and green patterns are drawn on the black background.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2813a
string.body: Kysis Guardian Insignia;A round badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2813_all]s. Thorny vine patterns are engraved on its edge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2814a
string.body: Elite Soldier Crest;A golden badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2814_all]s. It's in the shape of a shield.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2815a
string.body: Miren Guardian Crest;An emblem engraved on the epaulet of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2815_all]s. It's embroidered with a castle gate and spears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2816a
string.body: Miren Guardian's Kisk;The small Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_2816_all]s. It's engraved with the image of a lady with bluish-green wings.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2819a
string.body: Sulfur Sap;The sap you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_AgrintB_29_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_RottenTreeB_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2820a
string.body: Small Undamaged Horn;Of all Asteria Tricos with big horns, only [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1251_Trico_31_An] has this small horn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2821a
string.body: Garcikhan Horn;A horn you can obtain by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1211_Gargoyle_30_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2822a
string.body: Starving Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1221_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2823a
string.body: Greedy Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1231_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2824a
string.body: Ravenous Pretor Heart;The heart of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1241_Pretor_38_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2825a
string.body: Aether's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsOd_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2825b
string.body: Fire's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsFire_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2825c
string.body: Core of Ancient Defender;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_BoneDrake_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2825d
string.body: Nature's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2825all
string.body: Defender's Core;The cores of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsOd_50_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_CyclopsFire_50_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_BoneDrake_50_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_AgrintGi_50_An] that you obtained by defeating each of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2826a
string.body: Light's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_LightGuardian_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2826b
string.body: Shadow's Defender's Core;The core you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1011_DarkGuardian_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2833a
string.body: Kalgolem Life Stone;The Life Stone you can get only from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SouledstoneD_36_An] in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2833b
string.body: Caltrops Life Stone;The Life Stone you can get only from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MimicAmethystD_36_An] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2051a
string.body: Golden Cornea;A thin membrane of gold color that you can get from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_Evileye_29_An]s in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2052a
string.body: Mosbear Claw;The claws you can get by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MosbearReD_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2052b
string.body: Vanargand's Flute;

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2054b
string.body: Quartz Lens;A transparent convex glass contained in a treasure box. Rumor has it that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadDarkAsNamedDQ_38_An] knows where it is.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2057a
string.body: Flame Bomb;A bomb made of powerful fire energy. Its effect varies depending on where it explodes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2058a
string.body: Signal Flare;A flare you use to signal the location of the Alquimia Research Center to Archons. You must use it at the entrance of the Alquimia Research Center.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2058etc
string.body: Lepharist Uniform;A uniform worn by the Lepharists. Very scratchy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_stone_dark_small
string.body: (A) Group Kisk;A portable Obelisk. You can buy it from general goods merchants, and also from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF3_9].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2052_tree_d_n_c_30a
string.body: Salix Log;A tree easily found all over Beluslan. It is mainly used as fuel for the refugee fires.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2052_Etc
string.body: Beritra's Weapon;A huge sword in the middle of the Besfer Ghost Village. Pollution corrupts the land around the sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2053c
string.body: Port Key;The key to a secret port. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LehparKnD_37_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KnA_LehparKnD_37_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_2054a
string.body: Captain Hinden's Letter;A surprisingly touching missive.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2055c
string.body: Aika's Key;A key you can obtain by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenNamedDQ_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2502a
string.body: Sticky Saliva;The sticky saliva of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_VaranusRe2D_29_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2503a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2504a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2504wine
string.body: Kirka Wine;Inexpensive wine you can buy from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Daraia] in Pandaemonium. It has a...flavor.

string.body: Four Types of Scales;Refers to the four different types of scales of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KalnifNmDQ_35_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KuillusReDQ_35_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KalnifReDQ_35_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KuillusVioletDQ_35_An] that you obtained by defeating each of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2515e
string.body: Silky Face Cream;An anti-aging ointment sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF2_5] in Morheim. Attracted by word-of-mouth, many women come to buy it. However, its effect is not proven yet.

string.body: Rynoce Leather;The leather of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_Rhinoce_48_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ha_17a
string.body: Waterproof Agent;An agent for blocking moisture. It is sold by Chiwurinerk in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_03a
string.body: Greater Leather Hardener;An agent used for hardening leather. It is sold by Proserpina in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_11a
string.body: Sobi String;Threads pulled from Sobi Fiber. It is sold by Proserpina in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q3101all
string.body: Materials for Water Bed;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3101a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ha_17a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_03a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_ta_11a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3104a
string.body: Galateia's Eyes;A fragment from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_Galateia].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3106a
string.body: Tipolid Horn;A horn of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_hippolizardRe_45_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3106b
string.body: Mudthorn Saliva;The saliva of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_MudthornSalt_45_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4105a
string.body: Hornskull's Luciferins;Luciferins obtained from the tentacles of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_SalivadoSeaSideD_45_An]. It glows brightly for a long time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_D_LEHPAR_QUEST_01A
string.body: Lepharist Written Oath;A written oath carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_HardR] in the Lepharist Citadel. It contains the pledge of a Lepharist to devote himself/herself to the cause of the Lepharist Revolutionaries. Obtain and bring the number of Oaths asked by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mirka] and you get a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4303a
string.body: Lepharist Mask;A mask carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_NormalR] in the Lepharist Citadel. They fetch a decent price.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4020a
string.body: Pink Box;An item that Parica asked Blume to get. It is not known what's inside.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1539a
string.body: Rynoce Meat;A lump meat that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rhinoce_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1591a
string.body: Flame Staff;A magic staff carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Spectre_41_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4500a
string.body: Insignia of Lepharist Special Ops Soldier;An insignia carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparWa_44_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparAs_44_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF3CL_LehparAsHide_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907a
string.body: RM-108c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-108c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907b
string.body: RM-78c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-78c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4907c
string.body: RM-138c Organic Sample;An organic sample of the bioweapon RM-138c created by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_01
string.body: Light Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Sulfur Tree Nest. You can feel the power of Light from this blade fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_02
string.body: Darkness Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Right Wing Chamber. It emanates the energy of darkness.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_03
string.body: Abyss Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Left Wing Chamber. It emanates the energy of abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_04
string.body: Rebirth Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Asteria Chamber. It emanates the energy of rebirth,

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_05
string.body: Destruction Blade Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment said to be hidden in the Chamber of Roah. It emanates the energy of destruction.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_06
string.body: Cold Hilt Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Isle of Roots Storeroom. You can feel the cold emanating from this hilt fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_07
string.body: Hot Hilt Fragment;A legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the secret storeroom of the Kration Disputed Land. You can feel a hot energy from this hilt fragment.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_08
string.body: Noble Ornament Fragment;A broken legendary weapon fragment that is said to be hidden in the Twilight Battlefield Storeroom.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3908a
string.body: Calling Stone;An activation stone that can summon the Avatar of Dragon Sword from the Artifact of the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3908b
string.body: Soul Piece;A piece of the soul of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LC1_DrakeVioletNamedQ_47_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4912a
string.body: Liberating Stone;A special activation stone for summoning the Cursed Drake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4912b
string.body: Blackened Spirit;The crystallized curse of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DC1_DrakeVioletNamedQ_47_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097all
string.body: Special Material;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1097c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097all
string.body: Spirit Blade Components;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2097c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097a
string.body: Fragment of the Shining Tower;A fragment infused with mysterious power. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097A] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097b
string.body: Drana-tempered Steel;Extremely strong steel. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097B] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1097c
string.body: Elements Crystal;A crystal inside the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF2A_ElementalKingNmd_50_Ah] in the Theobomos Lab.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097a
string.body: Ancient Balaur Heart;A heart extracted from a dragon. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097A] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097b
string.body: Pure Drazma Crystal;A Drazma crystal of high purity. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDLF1_FOBJ_Q1097B] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2097c
string.body: Blue Golem;A mysterious crystal studded on the necklace of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Adma_DeathknightNamed_50_Ah] in Adma Stronghold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a
string.body: Blue Balaur Scale;A special scale infused with Balic Power, which can only be obtained from powerful Balaur. You can either get it from the Balaur guarding the fortresses or Artifacts in Reshanta, or the Balaur at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_E2] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_009] in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_li
string.body: Rift Essence;A mysterious item that can charge artifact activation stones with magical energy. Sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF3_5], a general goods merchant in Heiron, and the general goods merchant at the Abyss fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_da
string.body: Rift Essence;A mysterious item that can charge artifact activation stones with magical energy. Sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Lapion], a general goods merchant in Beluslan, and the general goods merchant at the Abyss fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3915a
string.body: Dragel Sample;A sample of Dragel, a substance that mutates living creatures. You can get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Varanus], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Naga], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Dragel_Brownie] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_G_FungyRe3_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3916a
string.body: Drana Sample;You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLF1_SZ_06] in Dark Poeta. Draconute soldiers may also carry it, albeit very rarely.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3918a
string.body: Surkana Piece;A piece of Surkana used as a power source by Balaur. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_IDLF1_F_Spaller], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Generator1] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_Surkana_Drakan].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3919a
string.body: Drazma Fragment;A fragment of the magical energy source that converts inorganic objects into lifeforms. You can obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_WaterGolem1], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_E_DranaTree_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_E_XipetoMoveRe_50_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_BionicCPU_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3711a
string.body: Dredgion Operation Plan;A document recorded with the future battle plans of the Baranath Dredgion. You can get it by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanBoss_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3715a
string.body: Surkanate;Material used to replenish various Surkana on the Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiSupply_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4502a
string.body: Concentrated Vitality;A concentrated mass of the fundamental Balic Power, which can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] in Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848a
string.body: Round Rift Stone;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_LizardAsKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848b
string.body: Flat Rift Stone;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_NagaFiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848c
string.body: Sharp Rift Stone;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_DrakanPrKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849a
string.body: Blue Balic Device;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_LizardRaKey_45_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_LizardAsKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849b
string.body: Red Balic Device;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_NagaWiKey_45_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_NagaFiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849c
string.body: White Balic Device;An object emanating the power of Time and Space. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Crotan_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Dkisas_DrakanPrKey_45_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Lamiren_DrakanWiKey_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_1848all
string.body: Stones of Time and Space; Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_1848c], which can be found in the secret storerooms on the Island of Root, the Kration Disputed Land and the Battlefield of Dusk.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_2849all
string.body: Cores of Time and Space;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_2849c], which can be found in the secret storerooms on the Island of Root, the Kration Disputed Land and the Battlefield of Dusk.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931all
string.body: Shulack's Surkana;Surkana manufactured with enhanced safety to allow the Shulacks to use it safely. It refers to the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3931c] that are carried by the head of the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931a
string.body: Blue Surkana;Surkana manufactured by Shulacks with safety in mind. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1] or get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931b
string.body: Red Surkana;Surkana manufactured by the Shulacks with enhanced safety. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3931c
string.body: Black Surkana;Surkana manufactured by the Shulacks with enhanced safety. It is carried by the captain of the ship, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3202a
string.body: Snow Blessing;A sweet fruit wine said to be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDshulackship_Barrel_Q3202] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3203a
string.body: Taming a Manduri;A book containing the methods of taming Manduri. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWiBreeder_42_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3206a
string.body: Pirate's Hairpin;Hairpins worn by members of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackAs_41_Ae_ver30] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRa_41_Ae_ver30].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3214a
string.body: The Pirates' Pouch;A pouch thought to contain valuable items. It seems to be in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_KrallKeeper_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3215a
string.body: Tightly Packed Bundle;Items belonging to Lukania that were stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackFiHard_45_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3217a
string.body: Scout Report;A confidential scout report of Nasuri. It was seized by Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4202a
string.body: Sandblossom Wine;A sweet fruit wine said to be contained in the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDshulackship_Barrel_Q3202] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4203a
string.body: Taming a Manduri;A book containing the methods of taming Manduri.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4206a
string.body: Steel Beard Pirate's Hat;A hat worn by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWi_41_Ae_ver30] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackPr_41_Ae_ver30].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4217a
string.body: Old Package;A package carried around by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_Lprisoner1_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a_da
string.body: Blue Balaur Scale;A special scale infused with Balic Power, it can only be obtained from powerful Balaur. You can either get it from the Balaur guarding the fortresses or Artifacts in Reshanta, or the Balaur at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_G6] or [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H] in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3937a
string.body: Malicemark;A symbol of malice and misfortune. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF2A_ElementalKingNmd_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4941a
string.body: Deathmark;A symbol of malice and misfortune. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_H_DrakanFiName_50_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Adma_DeathknightNamed_50_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3935a
string.body: Sanctum Decoration;A symbolic decoration created to recognize the distinguished services performed for Elysea. You can receive it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dairos] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Iocaste] after showing the proof of your deed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4939a
string.body: Pandaemonium Decoration;A symbolic decoration created to recognize the distinguished services performed for Asmodae. You can receive it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Tragi] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Genoveva] after showing the proof of your deed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3932a
string.body: Processed Drana;Drana carried by the Drakan who infiltrated Dark Poeta. It's been processed for convenience and can be bought from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3932b
string.body: Hewahewa's Research Report;A surprisingly complex document detailing Greater Stigma research, written and carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_ShulackScientist_50_Ae] in Dark Poeta. You can also buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935all
string.body: Pirates' Research Log;A document of records prepared by the Shulacks of the Steel Beard Pirates. You can buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1] or get it from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah] on the ship Steel Rake.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935a
string.body: Pirates' Research Log;A document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackEngineerNmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935b
string.body: Pirates' Battle Log;A document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackRaAtilleryChKnmd_45_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4935c
string.body: Pirates' Plunder Lists;A document carried by the captain of Steel Rake, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackCaptainNmd_46_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4936a
string.body: Drana Fragment;A fragment of Drana that can be obtained from Drakan in Dark Poeta. You can also buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q4936b
string.body: Hewahewa's Scroll;A scroll carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLF1_ShulackScientist_50_Ae] in Dark Poeta, it is said to contain the information on Greater Stigma. It can also be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3203aa
string.body: Manduri Taming Manual;A book about the ways of taming Manduri, which is in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDShip_ShulackWiBreeder_42_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_01
string.body: Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_02
string.body: Glossy Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_03
string.body: Divine Oath Stone;A stone needed in making a vow of loyalty. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Perena] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Ophenes] of the Caps and Straps on the Divine Road in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_01
string.body: Pure Holy Water;Holy water needed to conduct the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_02
string.body: Glowing Holy Water;Holy water needed to conduct the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_relic_d_03
string.body: Mysterious Holy Water;Holy water needed to conducting the purification ritual. It is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Olda] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Gerad] of the Fine Accessories Shop on Prosperity Road in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM1
string.body: Upper Blade Fragments;Refers to the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_02], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_03] that can be obtained from treasure chests in the Sulfur Tree Nest, Right Wing Chamber and Left Wing Chamber.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM2
string.body: Lower Blade Fragments;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_04] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_05] that can be obtained from treasure chests in the Chamber of Roah and Asteria Chamber respectively.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_swordM3
string.body: Remaining Fragments;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_06], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_07], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_ab1_08] which can be obtained from the treasure boxes in the secret storerooms on the Island of Root, the Kration Disputed Land and the Battlefield of Dusk.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3939b
string.body: Tear of Luck;A piece of fantastic power that is said to be found somewhere in Elysea. A legend says that it brings luck to whoever finds it. There is an extremely low chance of obtaining it from Perer, Griffonia, or Lunime by using special extraction tools.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4943b
string.body: Light of Luck;A piece of fantastic light that is said to be found somewhere in Asmodae. A legend says that it brings luck to whoever finds it. There is an extremely low chance of obtaining it from Cippo, Grobule, or Leopis by using special extraction tools.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4942a
string.body: Crafted Heart;Refers to [%dic:STR_DIC_I_4942aa] created using crafting skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4942aa
string.body: Hot Heart of Magic;A crystal of magic that can only be created by experts with the greatest expertise. It can be obtained while crafting a Heart of Magic.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3705_Li
string.body: Time Activation Stone;An activation stone for the Artifact of Transcendence that can take you to Dark Poeta. You can acquire it by bringing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_li] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Maloren].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4705_Da
string.body: Time Activation Stone;An activation stone for the Artifact of Circulation that can take you to Dark Poeta. You can acquire it by bringing [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_drop_component01_a_da] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_junk_idlf1_sale_component01_a_da] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Hresvelgr].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_40
string.body: Blue Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Marvelous Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_45
string.body: Red Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Recondite Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_LIGHT_50
string.body: Yellow Aether Powder;The Aether powder that imbues the Profound Charm with power. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Melicertes] in Sanctum.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_40
string.body: Glossy Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_45
string.body: Glowing Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_CHARM_DARK_50
string.body: Brilliant Aether Paper;Rare paper used for special purposes. It is sold by the Consumable Item Distributor [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Dein] in Pandaemonium.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_3975a
string.body: Heart of Magic;A crystal made from various materials including Boiling Balaur Blood Stains. A Hot Heart of Magic is required to join the Miragent Holy Templars, so many of these hearts are made during the test.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_4975a
string.body: Heart of Magic;A crystal made from various materials including Boiling Balaur Blood Stains. A Hot Heart of Magic is required to join Fenris's Fangs, so many of these hearts are made during the test.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_ab1_dragonheart_fire
string.body: Burning Balaur Heart;A heart burning with the power of the Balaur. Cut from a Naga, Nagarant, Drakan, or Draconute of Level 51~60.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714a
string.body: Adjutant's Seal;A seal carried by Drakan adjutants aboard the Dredgion. Stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_NagaPrNCB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanMaNamed_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiDRB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiMAA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanMaSBoss_50_Ah], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1__Dreadgion_DrakanRaKeyNamedB_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714b
string.body: Captain's Seal;A seal carried by Drakan captains aboard the Dredgion. Stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_NagaPrNCA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiDRA_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiMAB_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanClNamed_50_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiNamed_50_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanRaKeyNamedA_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714c
string.body: Auditor's Diary;A diary carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanRAInspector_50_Ah]. It is filled with detailed notes and records.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714d
string.body: Quartermaster's Proxy;A proxy document carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDAb1_Dreadgion_DrakanFiSupply_50_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3714all
string.body: Dredgion Trophies;Evidence collected from eliminating key figures on board the Dredgion: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714c], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_3714d].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_4522
string.body: Gorgon Pelt;Skin from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GorgonWhiteBabyD_42_n]s or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_GorgonWhiteD_43_n]s. It is tough and provides good protection against the cold.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3320a
string.body: Frillneck Mane;A full, leathery mane cut from the head of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamFemale_23_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3322a
string.body: Big Baku Horn;A ragged horn stained with gore. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Baku_25_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3518a
string.body: Sylphen Eye;A wet eye taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaRE_36_An]. Some say it blinks even after death.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3520a
string.body: Pearly Crynac Scale;A hard scale of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Criton_41_An]. It seems to shine with a light all its own.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46525a
string.body: Stolen Letter;A letter said to have been stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_DFighter_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46526a
string.body: Bitterwing's Root;A sample collected from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Vampire_DR_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46528a
string.body: Twisted Ore;An altered substance that can only be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_CyclopsOd_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36520a
string.body: Fake Fin;A slick fin of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Cellatu_Frog_51_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36522a
string.body: Grimmson's Horn;A hard horn of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_LizardFi_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36524a
string.body: Reian's Wing Feather;A soft wing feather from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_AncientClanFi_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36525a
string.body: Megabex Tail;A tail from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Fethlot_Highland_54_n] to be used as a research sample.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36527a
string.body: Mocking Gryphu's Wings;The filthy wings of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Condor_Dr_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_36528a
string.body: Sticky Condensed Aether;Aether accumulated in the core of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_DayQ_Wisp_55_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3722a
string.body: Shockwave Emitter;A weapon made from Drana obtained in Dark Poeta. It is meant for use on the Chantra Dredgion, and its effect on Balaur is yet to be confirmed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3723a
string.body: Balaur Supplies;A heavy weapon taken from the Balaur weapon supply box. It can be found in the armories on the Chantra Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724a
string.body: Balaur Officer's Insignia;An insignia owned by high-ranking Drakan serving on the Chantra Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanPrNCA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaKeyNamedA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiDRA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiMAA_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiNamed_55_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanClNamed_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724b
string.body: Balaur Adjutant's Insignia;An insignia owned by Drakan adjutants serving on the Chantra Dredgion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanMaNamed_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanPrNCB_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanMaSBoss_55_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiDRB_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiMAB_55_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaKeyNamedB_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724c
string.body: Audit Report;A document compiled by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanRaInspector_55_Ah] about the operation of the Chantra Dredgion. It was written for high-ranking Drakan officers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724d
string.body: Supplies Register;A log of weapons inspections carried out by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDDreadgion_02_DrakanFiSupply_55_Ae] on the Chantra Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46521a
string.body: Stuffed Gryphu;A stuffed toy in the likeness of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Condor_DR_52_An]. Legend has it that it increases the financial luck of those who sleep with the toy at their bedside, making it popular with merchants and Shugos.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_46524a
string.body: Forest Essence;Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DayQ_Foam_DR_54_An]. It glows with the concentrated power of forest collected over a long period of time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724_all
string.body: Evidence of Infiltration;Evidence that you eliminated key officers of the Chantra Dredgion--[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724c], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3724d].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18607a
string.body: Dream Fragment;A legendary crystal that is said to take any form its creator wishes. It can be obtained from Kaliga's [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCromede_2up_Mguard2_38_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCromede_2up_Rguard2_38_An]s, encountered in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDCromede].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KEY_IDNOVICE_BOX_01
string.body: Rusty Key;A key that opens the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube] in the Haramel Tower. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDNovice_04_RatmanMWa_Key_18_an].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KEY_IDNOVICE_BOX_02
string.body: Lubricating Oil;Oil carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDNovice_04_RatmanMWa_Num_18_an]s. Opening the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Closed_Cube] requires 3 units of oil.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_PROTECTION_01
string.body: Progress Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Alabaster Order.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_HEADQUARTERS_01
string.body: Radiant Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for Radiant Ops.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_HUNTERS_01
string.body: Fortuneers Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Fortuneers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_PROTECTION_01
string.body: Ward Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Field Wardens.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_HEADQUARTERS_01
string.body: Crusader Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for the Blood Crusade.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_D_HUNTERS_01
string.body: Daemon Token;A token demonstrating that you have successfully carried out a mission for Charlirunerk's Daemons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_48602a
string.body: Claw Spear;A weapon that the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanFighterS_16_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanSeekerS_17_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_16_Ae] carry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_48605a
string.body: Vined Amulet;An Ice Claw Tribe amulet carried by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LycanKnightM_28_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeC_LycanKnightM_30_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AeA_LycanAssassinM_29_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_PeA_LycanPriestM_29_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FeA_LycanFighterM_29_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ReA_LycanRangerM_28_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HeA_LycanHunterM_29_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_WeA_LycanWizardM_29_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_MATERIAL_STIGMA_QUEST_01
string.body: Aether Refining Toolbox;It contains tools used for refining Ensouled Aether. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Archon] in the Inggison Illusion Fortress sells a limited number of them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11275a
string.body: Ensouled Aether;Aether dwelling in the bodies of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Trico_55_n]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Tricon_55_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_ElementalWater4_55_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_FlyingFoam_55_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47101A
string.body: Report Box;Held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanPriestS_19_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanS_19_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_LycanShamanS_18_Ae_2], and only obtainable by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Da_47101].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47108A
string.body: Command Box;Held by the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeC_LycanKnightM_38_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FeA_LycanFighterM_40_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LycanKnightM_39_Ae], and obtainable only by [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a
string.body: Circle Communique;Records of The Circle, kept in [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47101A] that only [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Da_47101] can obtain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47114a
string.body: Circle Doctrine;The all-mighty orders of The Circle, kept in [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WRAP_LYCAN_QUEST_47108A] that only [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_47101a] can obtain.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_47000a
string.body: Crystal Ball;This sphere tracks and records the Ward Orb's condition.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37000A
string.body: Blue Inina;Toxic shellfish in the Ellun River. You'll need a Mentor to help you crack the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000]'s shell.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37001A
string.body: Tursin Flame;A symbol obtainable by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37001all] with the aid of a Mentor in the Tursin Outpost.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37005A
string.body: Kaidan Ore;Ore carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37005all] in the Kaidan Mine.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37008A
string.body: Traitor's Badge;A mark of so-called honor for [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37008all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37100A
string.body: Mutated Inina Shell;The shell of [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Q37000].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37500A
string.body: Supreme Abyss Award;If you're lucky while crafting an [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37500B], there is a chance you may produce this fine award.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37500B
string.body: Abyss Award;An award for Daevas who fought with valor in the Abyss.

string.body: Supreme Balaurea Award;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37501B], there is a chance you may produce this fine award.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37501B
string.body: Balaurea Award;An award for Daevas who fought with valor in Balaurea.

string.body: Supreme Tiamaranta Award;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37502B], there is a chance you may produce this fine reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37502B
string.body: Tiamaranta Award;An award for Daevas who fought with valor in Tiamaranta.

string.body: Supreme Seraphim Offering;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37503B], there is a chance you may produce this fine offering.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_37503B
string.body: Seraphim Offering;An offering to Lady Ariel. It is a mark of dedication and respect towards her.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47500A
string.body: Supreme Abyss Reward;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47500B], there is a chance you may produce this fine reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47500B
string.body: Abyss Reward;A reward for Daevas who fought with valor in the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47501A
string.body: Supreme Balaurea Reward;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47501B], there is a chance you may produce this fine reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47501B
string.body: Balaurea Reward;A reward for Daevas who fought with valor in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47502A
string.body: Supreme Tiamaranta Reward;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47502B], there is a chance you may produce this fine reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47502B
string.body: Tiamaranta Reward;A reward for Daevas who fought with valor in Tiamaranta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47503A
string.body: Supreme Shedim Offering;If you're lucky while crafting a [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47503B], there is a chance you may produce this fine offering.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_47503B
string.body: Shedim Offering;An offering to Lord Azphel. It is a mark of dedication and respect towards him.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_tree_d_30a
string.body: Salix Log;Trees that grow in the areas from the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D1] to the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D2].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_tree_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Wrud Tree;A tree, commonly used for firewood, that grows near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_plant_d_20a
string.body: Twisp;A plant that lives for several years. It is commonly sought after because its fibers are used for Thread. It grows around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3], and you can get [%dic:STR_DIC_E_plant_d_n_c_20a] from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_plant_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Twisp Fiber;The fibers from a [%dic:STR_DIC_E_gb_source_plant_d_20a] plant. The thread extracted from it is used to make clothes.

string.name: STR_DIC_E_berry_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Vinna;The fruit of the Rosaceae trees that only grow in the wild. You can see them near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_vegetable_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Rabano;An edible plant that grows near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A3] and the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_fish_d_n_c_20a
string.body: Gadill;Fish that live in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_gb_source_fish_d_20b
string.body: Dorado;Fish that live in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B3], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B4].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_berry_d_n_c_20b
string.body: Kirka;A plant that only grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4]. People enjoys its fruit.

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a
string.body: Adamantium;Black ore found commonly all over Morheim. You can get [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_c_30a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_r_30a] from it.

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_c_30a
string.body: Adamantium Ore;An ore obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a].

string.name: STR_DIC_DG_metal_n_r_30a
string.body: Greater Adamantium Ore;This rare ore is obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_DG_gb_source_metal_d_30a].

string.name: STR_DIC_E_vegetable_d_n_c_20b
string.body: Chikra;An edible plant that only grows in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_A4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ws_001
string.body: Steel Ingot;It is made by casting [%dic:STR_DIC_I_herb_n_c_10a2] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_recipe_001] on the Armor Forge or Weapon Forge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_001
string.body: Charcoal Briquette;The material used to sharpen a weapon or to make [%dic:STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ws_001]s which can be bought from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Mime] or [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Grupask].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_SHELL_D_10A
string.body: Conide;A shellfish found near the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_TREE_D_10A
string.body: Tecoma Log;A sturdy tree that grows in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_3]. At [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_work_production] you can trim and process it into wood for furniture.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_recipe_d_ha_001
string.body: Tecoma Wood;Made by trimming [%dic:STR_DIC_I_GB_SOURCE_TREE_D_10A]s on the Handicrafting Ledge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2909a
string.body: Lesser Elemental Stone;You can obtain it from the Lobnites or Sparkies inhabiting in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_2] or can synthesize it from the Elemental Water at [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LF3_Alchemy_production].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2909b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_2927purelove
