string.name: STR_DIC_DF2B_herb_d_n_c_40a
string.body: Subella;Its leaves are used as medicinal ingredients, and it sometimes blooms white flowers. Its flower meaning is 'Noble Death'. It can be seen in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B1], [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B3], and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2B_SZ_B2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30020

string.body: Noble Staff Components;Siel's Supreme Staff and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.body: Noble Spellbook Components;Siel's Supreme Spellbook and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark
string.body: Nox Ingot;A rare ore said to have been created by the chaotic energy given off by a clash between Tiamat and Lady Siel before the Cataclysm. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aglauros], an elder of the Reian tribe, is willing to trade one for a favor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30116
string.body: Noble Sword Components;Siel's Supreme Sword and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30118
string.body: Noble Greatsword Components;Siel's Supreme Greatsword and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.body: Noble Polearm Components;Siel's Supreme Polearm and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.body: Noble Staff Components;Siel's Supreme Staff and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.body: Noble Bow Components;Siel's Supreme Bow and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.body: Noble Dagger Components;Siel's Supreme Dagger and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30132
string.body: Noble Mace Components;Siel's Supreme Mace and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30052a
string.body: Jotun Relics;Ancient Jotun relics scattered around Silentera Canyon. They may be imbued with Petralith power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11450a
string.body: Young Taloc Leaf;Young leaves of Taloc, a Holy Tree. They glitter with dew and mystery. </br>You can obtain it only from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Seed_Q11450].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11452a
string.body: Mosqua's Poison;The poison fluid of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae]. It's foul-smelling and acidic.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11454a
string.body: Growth Sap; Special sap found in the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Rottentree_Green_52_An]. It is full of growth energy because it has been influenced by Taloc's energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11456a
string.body: Mutant Chromosome;Biological material drawn from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q11456all] that live within Taloc. It has mutated in an unusual way.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11457a
string.body: Wooden Core;Shards of inner wood from Taloc. Examining it shows how the mighty Elim grew.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11459a
string.body: Komad Spirit;The inner spirit of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWa_52_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWi_52_Ae]s. It shines with vitality stolen from Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_11461a
string.body: Taloc Research Diary;A diary discovered in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Book_Q11461]. Its content is difficult to understand, but seems important.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21450a
string.body: Taloc's Young Leaf;Leaf from Taloc, a Holy Tree. His leaves are known to have a healing effect.</br>Only found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Seed_Q11450].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21452a
string.body: Mosqua's Fluid;The sap of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae]. It sticks to almost everything.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21454a
string.body: Growth Accelerant; Mysterious sap found in the body of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Slime_DR_52_An]. It was collected from the tree with Aether energy in the Krug Basin and is full of growth energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21456a
string.body: Insect Sample;A husk from one of the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q11456all] inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21457a
string.body: Core Wood;Shards of inner wood from Taloc. Examining it shows how the mighty Elim grew.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21459a
string.body: Komad Soul;The inner spirit of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWa_52_Ae] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_3F_KomadeWi_52_Ae]. It shines with vitality stolen from Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_21461a
string.body: Taloc Research Report;An important report that was discovered in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDElim_Book_Q11461]. Its contents are hard to understand, but seem important.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11003a
string.body: Seafoam Energy;The energy of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Foam_Wisp_51_n]. It is used in making Illusion Spheres.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11003b
string.body: Excura Energy;The energy of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Shadowstalker_Leaf_51_An]. It is used in making Illusion Spheres.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_al_part_stone3_04a
string.body: Greater Magic Power Crystal;A crystal that forms in Greater Elemental Water.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11004a
string.body: Thick Silk Pouch;A pouch containing cured Elemental Stone powder.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_GODSKILL_ITEM
string.body: Taloc's Tears;Taloc's tears of anger. If used, heavy damage is dealt to nearby living creatures. Only usable inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_L_SHAPE_IDELIM_LGUARDIANCHIEF
string.body: Taloc Fruit;Fruit taken from Taloc. When eaten, they unlock a Daeva's power. Only usable inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10022a
string.body: Klaw Digestive Gland;A digestive gland from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Neut_Worker_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024c
string.body: Balaur Jacket;A jacket commonly worn by the Drakan. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanFi_vil_54_An]s of Mephistis Farm wear them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024d
string.body: Balaur Pants;Pants commonly worn by the Drakan. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanRa_vil_54_An]s of Mephistis Farm wear them.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024e
string.body: Balaur Helmet;An older style of Drakan helmet. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanRa_vil_NamedQ_54_An] of Mephistis Farm wears one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10023d
string.body: Bloody Greatsword;A mighty greatsword wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticAs_NamedQ_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10025d
string.body: Generator Core;A part essential to the function of a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q10025C].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30201a
string.body: Transport Report;A report detailing supplies being transported from Hanarkand to an unknown destination. Vital to the job of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_FanaticFi_Q_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30207a
string.body: Fragrant Oil Gland;A gland from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Dragonfly_55_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_DragonSnake_55_An]. When refined, it is a key ingredient in perfumed oils.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30211a
string.body: Quartz Rod;The energy source for the Rift Orb. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCatacombsN_ShadowStalker_55_Ah] has one.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_IDCatacombs_Certification_01
string.body: Decree of Valor;Proof of great valor, courage, and strength in service of your people. The more you have, the greater rewards you can earn.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217_All
string.body: Stigma Ceremony Relics;Items necessary to hold a ceremony opening a new Stigma slot: the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217a] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217b]. They are held by the Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217a
string.body: Spirit's Incense Burner;A burner holding sweet-smelling incense. Vital to a ceremony opening Stigma slots. It is in the hands of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Aeshma], a Tiamat underling.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30217b
string.body: Scroll of Repose;An ancient scroll written with mystic runes. Vital to a ceremony opening Stigma slots. It is in the hands of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Bhemah], a Stormwing underling.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30223a
string.body: Plaguebearer's Core;The core of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_IDCatacombsN_HugeSlimeNmd_55_Ah]. Vital to the research of new poisons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_IDCatacombs_Reric_01
string.body: Balaur Relics;Ancient items important to the Drakan. Carried by strong enemies in Beshmundir Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30226a
string.body: Fantasy Bubble;Staring into this bubble allows you to see your previous night's dreams. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_FlyingFoam_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30228a
string.body: Gray Twig;A seemingly ordinary stick filled with nature's vitality. Obtained by defeating a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Xipeto_Stone_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30229a
string.body: Hard Shell;A shell as solid as stone. Cut from the hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Centipede_53_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_Centipede_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30210b
string.body: Sulfur Crystal;Rubbing this stone on paper darkens faded lettering. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Cyclops_Acid_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Vampire_Acid_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_Agrint_Acid_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30212a
string.body: Surkana Fragment;The only known substance that can recharge the Quartz Rod. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Spaller_mini_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_Spaller_mini_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_Spaller_mini_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30230a
string.body: Balaur Scale;A scale with the power to affect Spirits. Only a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanWorkerFi_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_DrakanWorkerPr_54_An] have the spiritual energy to grow such scales.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30231a
string.body: Gryphu's Head Feather;A common focus in ceremonies to summon the Spirits of Balaurea. Usually plucked from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Condor_Dr_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30233_All
string.body: Ritual Components;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30228a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30229a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30230a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30231a] requested by Teressa in exchange for the Key to Blue Flame Incinerator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01
string.body: Vorpal Essence;Rumor has it that merely looking at it can kill a Human. A Balaur living in Beshmundir Temple is its current guardian.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a
string.body: Special Shulack Refiner;Shulack Elder Lupukin, held in Beshmundir Temple, has the last known sample of this liquid.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235_All
string.body: Blessed Sword Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Sword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30236_All
string.body: Blessed Greatsword Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Greatsword.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30237_All
string.body: Blessed Polearm Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Polearm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30238_All
string.body: Blessed Staff Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Staff.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30239_All
string.body: Blessed Weapon Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and a Noble Siel's weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30240_All
string.body: Blessed Orb Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Orb.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30241_All
string.body: Blessed Bow Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Bow.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30242_All
string.body: Blessed Dagger Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Dagger.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30243_All
string.body: Blessed Mace Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Mace.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30301a
string.body: Supply Report;A report about supplies being transported from Mitrakand to an unknown destination. Currently being used by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticFi_Q_54_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30307a
string.body: Fragrant Milky Liquid;A cloudy liquid with an intense scent. Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mudthorn_DR_54_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Foam_DR_55_An]s, or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Slime_DR_55_An]s. When refined, it is a common ingredient in perfumed oils.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30310b
string.body: Maroon Bile;Faded letters treated with this liquid become easier to read. Obtainable from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DragonFly_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Varanus_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30312a
string.body: Mystical Root;A root that has drunk in arcane energy from deep within the earth. Grows from the tips of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Vampire_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30326a
string.body: Dream Powder;An elixir made from this powder allows its drinker to recall any dream. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30328a
string.body: Opaque Bladder;An item needed to call out Water Spirits. You can obtain it from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Cellatu_DR_54_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_CellatuDR_Baby_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30329a
string.body: Oozing Klaw Gland;A gland that is such a strong center of energy, it is often used to summon Spirits. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_Worker_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_WorkerHigh_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_Fly_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Neut_FlyHigh_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30330a
string.body: Pteron Bone Piece;Shards from the skeleton of a long-extinct bird. [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallFi_DR_55_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallSc_DR_55_An]s carry them as talismans.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30331a
string.body: Tattered Membrane;A material used to summon Fire Spirits. Obtained from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Bonedrake_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30333_All
string.body: Ritual Components;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30328a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30329a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30330a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30331a] requested by Yumir in exchange for the Key to Blue Flame Incinerator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11024a
string.body: Crestlich Beak;A yellow beak from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Crestlich_Head_51_n]. It is strong enough to shatter rocks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11025a
string.body: Boco's Beak;Twice as big as a normal Crestlich's beak. Used with deadly force by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A1_Crestlich_NamedQ_52_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028a
string.body: Neokin Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_Kuillus_Drana_51_An]. It is sticky and smelly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028b
string.body: Crestlich Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_Crestlich_Drana_51_An]. It is thin and runny.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11028c
string.body: Murmur Fluid;Fluid from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A2_BAT_Drana_51_An]. It is viscous and bubbly.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11031a
string.body: Moonflower Petal;Petals from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A4_Fellial_Dr_51_An]. Eating even a small piece makes you sleepy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11033a
string.body: Vortile Fin;Fins from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Varanus_Axolotl_51_n]. They are perfectly shaped to make sudden bursts of speed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11035a
string.body: Pluma Tail Feathers;Tail feathers that once adorned an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A_Lupyllini_Peacock_51_n]. They shimmer with many colors.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11035b
string.body: Obelisk Layout;A document stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Lupyllini_NamedQ_52_n]. It is a map marking places where Obelisks are installed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037a
string.body: Mookie Stem;A stem from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n]. It's as dry as a desert dune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037b
string.body: Cellatu Skin;The skin of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Cellatu_Frog_51_An]. It's stretched out and almost see-through.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shell_n_c_50a
string.body: Anevra;A shellfish sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_A5_Shulack]. It makes savory stews and soups.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_co_23a
string.body: Triora Noodle;A hearty noodle sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Luelas]. It tastes great with or without sauce.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037all
string.body: Tantalizing Recipe;An intricate recipe that requires 15 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037a]s, 7 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11037b]s, 10 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shell_n_c_50a]s, and 3 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shopmaterial_co_23a]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11039a
string.body: Village Chief's Helmet;A helmet worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackFi_NamedQ_52_Ae]. It has been passed down through many generations of Shulack chieftains.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11044a
string.body: Dionae Aether Gem;Crystallized piece of Aether absorbed by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Dionaea_Od_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11044b
string.body: Rotron Aether Gem;Crystallized piece of Aether absorbed by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Rottentree_Green_52_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11049a
string.body: Taloc's Soul;A sample of extremely unstable Aether. You can obtain them from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_ClodwormNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DElim_3F_KomadeNM_53_Ae] living inside Taloc.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11104a
string.body: Ancient Reian Watch;An ancient Reian relic stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Crestlich_Stone_53_n]. It has kept perfect time for millenia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11104b
string.body: Ancient Reian Hairpin;An ancient Reian relic stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Bookie_Stone_53_An]. It has a simple, understated beauty.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20022e
string.body: Generation Device Maker;A magical stone that creates Aether Generators. Use only in an area where a [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_DranaSuctionDevice_B1_Q20022] has already been destroyed.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20022all
string.body: Tissue Sample;Samples taken from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_OdPlants_Q20022]es, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Hellhound_Wolf_53_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_DF4_OdAndDrana_Q20022]es found in the Marayas Scrubland.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20020b
string.body: Balaur's Belongings;Possessions carried by Balaur survivors of the Crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20020a
string.body: Watching Eye;A device developed by the 1st Pandaemonium Research Center that records images of the area it watches. It works only near the Crashed Dredgion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20025c
string.body: Mind Control Potion;A potion made by Hresvelgr that will allow you to temporarily control Kumbanda's mind.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11113a
string.body: Golden Skin;Shiny metallic skin obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Centipede_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11114a
string.body: Pixiebelle's Ingot;A large, valuable ingot guarded jealously by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B2_Bookie_NamedQ_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115all
string.body: Relief Package;A package of supplies for refugees. Includes [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115b], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_food_hpregen_20a], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_shop_food_mpregen_20a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115a
string.body: Barghest Fur;Fur from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B3_Hellhound_Wolf_53_An]. Used in the best cold weather gear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11115b
string.body: Rotron Firewood;Firewood obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B3_Rottentree_Green_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_food_hpregen_20a
string.body: Potcrab Soup;Filling, fragrant soup sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fabius].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_shop_food_mpregen_20a
string.body: Mela Juice;Freshly squeezed juice sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Fabius].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116a
string.body: Mookie Needle;Thin, surprisingly sharp thorns from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116b
string.body: Mookie Pickles;A traditional Shulack dish made by soaking a thousand needles from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_Fungy_Cactus_51_n]s in a seasoned brine.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11116c
string.body: Candy Can;A can of candies of assorted fruit flavors. Most children who grew up in Sanctum have fond memories of this treat.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11118a
string.body: Stunned Seafoam;A stunned [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A3_Foam_Wisp_52_n]. Who knows how long it'll stay that way.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11121a
string.body: Warmonger's Shield;A runed shield once carried by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticKn_53_Ae]. It exudes strength and purpose.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11121b
string.body: Conjurer's Ring;A ring once worn by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticWi_53_Ae]. It exudes darkness and mystery.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125a
string.body: Dragrint Remnant;Mutated tissue taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Xipeto_Drana_54_An]. It's still warm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125b
string.body: Crestlich Remnant;Contaminated tissue taken from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Crestlich_Drana_54_An]. It's still pulsing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11125c
string.body: Neokin Tissue;Odd tissue taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B4_Kuillus_Drana_54_An]. It's still twitching.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11127a
string.body: Klaw Shell;The shell of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B7_Neut_Workerhigh_53_An]. It's pitted from years of wear.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11200a
string.body: Banner of Greed;A boldly colored standard carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_QUEST_11200all]. The sight of them strike fear in the hearts of their enemies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11206a
string.body: Ksellid Carapace;Hardened shells obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardDad_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardMom_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C2_ShellizardBaby_55_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_11216a
string.body: Balaur's Map;A map marking four important regions in Balaurea.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216b
string.body: Eastern Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216c
string.body: Western Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216B].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11216d
string.body: Southern Symbol;A relic that decodes the Balaur map. Obtained from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF4_FOBJ_Q11216C].

string.body: Scale Pattern Staff;An intricately fashioned staff carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanPr_noble_55_Ae].

string.body: Zanuta's Memory Crystal;A crystal owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_noble_NamedQ_55_Ae]. It crackles with pent-up energy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11220a
string.body: Serrator Carapace;The cracked carapace of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C_DragonSnake_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11051a
string.body: Dragonbound's Bandana;A piece of cloth stitched with images of the Balaur. Worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticFi_53_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticKn_53_An]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticAs_53_An]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B6_FanaticRa_53_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11052a
string.body: Glossy Bead;A bead that glows weirdly in direct light. Obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Bookie_Fairy_53_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_B_Mimic_Cristal_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11053a
string.body: Dry Ettin Leaf;Crumbly leaves found in the branches of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_Ettin_55_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C4_EttinBig_55_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11054a
string.body: Balic Outer Scale;A razor-edged scale taken from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanFi_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanAs_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanRa_noble_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanWi_noble_55_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_DrakanPr_noble_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11055a
string.body: Dragon Flame;The essence of a dragon's rage. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_DrakanKn_54_Ae].

string.body: Worthy Hammer;Heavy and deadly hammer wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimWalker_53_Ah]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimGuard_53_Ah]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11065a
string.body: Nasty Sap;Foul-smelling sap obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Mudthorn_DR_54_An].

string.body: Scolopen Poison Sting;The poisonous barb of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Scorpion_Rough_54_An]. It still contains enough venom to kill a Human.

string.body: Shulack Beard;A Shulack's pride and joy. Shaved from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackAs_51_Ae]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackKn_51_Ae]s, and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_A5_ShulackFi_51_Ae]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_OD_QUEST_55A
string.body: Dazzling Aether;A rare type of Aether. To obtain this Aether, you need to have a skill level 350 or higher and to wear the Expert Aethertapping Ring while extracting the Burning Vortex.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_OD_QUEST_55B
string.body: Luminous Aether;A rare type of Aether. To obtain this Aether, you need to have a skill level 375 or higher and to wear the Expert Aethertapping Ring while extracting the Burning Vortex.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21042b
string.body: Mau Blood;The blood of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_LycanFi_DR_53_An]. It bubbles with malice.

string.body: Fanatic's Parchment;Refers to the parchments carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticFi_53_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticKn_53_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticAs_53_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticRa_53_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticWi_53_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticEl_53_Ae], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_FanaticPr_53_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21049a
string.body: Taloc's Shard;Mysterious shards brimming with spiritual power. Obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_ClodwormNM_52_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_NeutWorkmanfly_Qeen_52_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DElim_3F_KomadeNM_53_Ae].

string.body: Crystal of Magic;A crystal with the power to animate stone. Commonly found as part of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueMM_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueFR_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_MaidengolemRe2_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueM_Re_54_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_SAM_Reric2_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21052a
string.body: Dratamin;A dried, jerky-like foodstuff carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanFi_Re_B1_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanPr_Re_B1_53_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_KrallSc_DR_53_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_LycanPr_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21053a
string.body: Pulsing Crystal;A glittering crystal that naturally forms in the body of an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_ShadowStalker_Sand_55_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_SandShark_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Vampire_DR_54_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Cyclops_55_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Nepilim_55_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21054a
string.body: Hardened Drakscale;A scale pried from the corpse of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanFi_vil_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanAs_vil_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanRa_vil_55_Ae], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanWi_vil_55_Ae], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_DrakanPr_vil_55_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21055a
string.body: Balaur Flame;A spark of inner flame from a Drakan. Obtained by slaying a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_DrakanKn_54_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21055b
string.body: Worthy Hammer;Heavy and deadly hammer wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimGuard_53_Ah]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDTemple_NepilimWalker_53_Ah]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21100a
string.body: Wood Board;Sturdy wooden plank carved from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Rottentree_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21101a
string.body: Cursed Tree Wood;Unusually thick wood, ideal for many uses. Cut from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Rottentree_DR_NmdQ_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21107a
string.body: Broken Knickknacks;Old, broken junk stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_Hiiv_DR_54_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21116a
string.body: Hazy Crystal;An opaque crystal used in everything from alchemy to jewelry. Cut from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueMM_53_An] or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_StatueFR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21123a
string.body: Senegal's Arrow;Arrow once owned by a Ranger. The Dragonbound in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_SZ_DF4_B6] have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21126a
string.body: Manticore's Shackle;Enchanted chains that can tame any beast. They bind the paws of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_GriffonPet_DR_53_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11129a
string.body: Blessing of Concentration;A holy icon provided by Jondas, an ordnance Quartermaster. If a group of Daevas pray over the icon for an Empyrean Lord's Agent enough times, the Agent can wield incredible power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21127a
string.body: Blessing of Devotion;A holy icon provided by from Cenvezo, an ordnance Quartermaster. If a group of Daevas pray over the icon for an Empyrean Lord's Agent enough times, the Agent can wield incredible power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21207a
string.body: Balaur Weapon;A cruel, sharp blade usually wielded by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Q21207].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01
string.body: Blessed Aurium Ingot;A very rare mineral that Shulacks use to make aircraft. It is hard but very malleable. Rumor has it that Lupukin, a Shulack elder, is selling an ingot.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10024f
string.body: Balaur Disguise;A disguise that allows the wearer to take the form of a Balaur. It only functions in [%dic:STR_DIC_SEN_LF4_SensoryArea_Q10024A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_SOIL_CONDITIONER_01
string.body: Special Fertilizer;A fertilizer used to promote the growth of cultivated plants. One of the useless items sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_Elim_1], it is ridiculously expensive.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031
string.body: Shining Vortex;Lumps of Aether found in the Eracus Temple Cavern, New Heiron Gate, Beluslan Fortress and various parts of Reshanta. Only Daevas with Aethertapping proficiency over 200 can extract them.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031_01
string.body: Aether Gem;Pieces of Aether that can be extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35031].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039
string.body: Burning Vortex;Lumps of Aether found in The Storm Circle and various parts of Reshanta. Only Daevas with Aethertapping proficiency over 300 can extract them.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039_01
string.body: Aether;Aether extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35039].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_01
string.body: Zeyla;A plant that grows on the Lankusis Plateau in Eltnen and around the Heiron Observatory. It is used for cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_02
string.body: Meon;A plant that grows on the Lankusis Plateau in Eltnen and around the Agairon Village. It is used for cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35032_03
string.body: Pleuro;A fish native to the waters around Agairon Village in Eltnen and Klawtan's Wallow in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033_01
string.body: Ulmus Wood;Wood from a tree that commonly grows west of the Agairon Village in Eltnen, the Klawtan's Wallow in Heiron, and the Decayed Grove.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033_02
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A nearly indestructible ore extracted from a vein of [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35033
string.body: Adamantium;An incredibly hard metal commonly found in southern Eltnen and western Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35034
string.body: Nepeta;An herb found near the Revolutionaries Bastion in Eltnen and the Vaizel's Peak in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_01
string.body: Zigi;A plant that grows in the Dirmoi Pass in Theobomos and the lands east of the Arbolu's Haven in Heiron. It is used in cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_02
string.body: Tange;A plant that grows in Poya Jungle in Heiron and the Manduri Valley. It is used in cooking.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35040_03
string.body: Esosa;A fish found in the Stenon Bay in Heiron and the Jeiaparan Village.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041_01
string.body: Egrasi Log;A tree commonly found in northern Theobomos and in central and northern Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041_02
string.body: Orichalcum Ore;Amazing ore extracted from an [%dic:STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041].

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35041
string.body: Orichalcum;A much sought-after metal found in southern Theobomos, the Lepharist Research Center in Heiron, and the Nolantis Ruins.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35042
string.body: Ferilla;An herb that grows extensively in areas such as the Empyrean Lords Sanctuary and Dirmoi Pass in Theobomos, and the Manduri Valley and Poya Jungle in Heiron.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45031_a
string.body: Aether Gem;A shard of Aether found by Aethertapping in the Sky Temple of Arkanis in Morheim or the skies over the Beluslan Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_a
string.body: Rogen;Found by Essencetapping at the Silver Mane Village in Morheim or the Mosbear Snowfield in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_b
string.body: Brommel;A cooking ingredient found by Essencetapping at Fall Road in Morheim or the Giants Valley in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45032_c
string.body: Jardine;A cooking ingredient found by Essencetapping at the Silver Mane Village in Morheim.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45033_a
string.body: Salix Log;A common type of wood obtained by Essencetapping in southern Morheim or northern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45033_b
string.body: Adamantium Ore;A raw material obtained by Essencetapping in southern and northwestern Morheim, the western region of Beluslan, or the upper and lower layers of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45034_a
string.body: Neunan;A potion ingredient found by Essencetapping at Fall Road in Morheim or the Besfer Ghost Village in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45039_a
string.body: Aether;A source of pure power. Obtained Aethertapping at Alukina's Palace in Beluslan or the upper layer of the Abyss.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_a
string.body: Vigen;A cooking ingredient commonly found in northern Brusthonin and southern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_b
string.body: Merone;A cooking ingredient found in southwestern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45040_c
string.body: Carpen;A cooking ingredient found in northwestern Brusthonin and Beluslan's Roof.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45041_a
string.body: Asvata Log;A hardwood found in central Brusthonin and southern Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45041_b
string.body: Orichalcum Ore;A valuable metal in eastern Brusthonin and the eastern and southern regions of Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45042_a
string.body: Subella;A potion ingredient found in central Brusthonin and around the Mamut Graveyard in Beluslan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4518a
string.body: White Daru Tail;The white tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DaruD_43_n]. Called a Lucky Tail for its legendary ability to lend luck to travelers.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35045
string.body: Magical Aether;Aether extracted from a [%dic:STR_DIC_AG_SOURCE_OD_50A].

string.name: STR_DIC_AG_SOURCE_OD_50A
string.body: Magical Vortex;A source of Aether that can be seen in Taloc's Forest, Skysling Canyon, and Calmheart Grove in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_01
string.body: Lapide;A plant found in the Calmheart Grove and Taloc's Forest in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_02
string.body: Nennane;A plant found in the Scar Canyon and Wretched Garden in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35046_03
string.body: Plindit;A fish found in the waters near Taloc's Forest and Rokoros Village in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35047_01
string.body: Nanyu Tree;A tree seen at Mephistis Farm and Angrief Ruins in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35047_02
string.body: Drenite Ore;Ore extracted from [%dic:STR_DIC_GB_SOURCE_METAL_50A].

string.name: STR_DIC_GB_SOURCE_METAL_50A
string.body: Drenite;A mineral found in Undirborg and Weeping Valley.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_35048
string.body: Zeldt;A plant found in the Wildheart Grove and Dimaia Fountainhead in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45045a
string.body: Magical Aether;Aether that can be obtained by performing Aethertapping in Gelkmaros using an Aether extractor.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046a
string.body: Jurak;A vegetable that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046b
string.body: Manzu;A type of nut that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45046c
string.body: Stria;A fish that can be caught in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45047a
string.body: Korie Log;A wood commonly used in construction that can be gathered in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45047b
string.body: Drenite Ore;Ore that can be gathered in Gelkmaros. It is commonly used in making weapons.

string.name: STR_DIC_G_QUEST_45048a
string.body: Plia;A herb that can be gathered in Gelkmaros. It is commonly used in making potions.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_MARCUTAN_REWARD_01A
string.body: Mastarius' Favor;A favor recognizing warriors who contributed greatly in the battles to capture the Elyos fortresses [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2011_A] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_2021_A], and in defeating Kaisinel's Agent, Veille.

string.body: Athana's Dagger;A dagger imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_BOW_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Bow;A bow imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_MACE_D_N_U0_Q_54A
string.body: Athana's Mace;A mace imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.body: Athana's Orb;An orb imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.body: Athana's Sword;A sword imbued with the power of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Vedrfonir].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_TA_PART_CLOTH2_03A
string.body: Fess Textile;Textile made from Fess. It can be weaved using the Tailoring skill.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21245a
string.body: Drakan Researcher's Journal;The research records of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An] in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_C5_Lab].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_KAISINEL_REWARD_01A
string.body: Veille's Favor;A favor recognizing warriors who contributed greatly in the battles to capture the Asmodian fortresses [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3011_A] and [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A], and in defeating Marchutan's Agent, Mastarius.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_DAMAGE_ITEM
string.body: Shishir's Powerstone;A magic stone that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Sheluk_KeyNM_52_Ae]. It enables powerful magic attacks.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_STONESKIN_ITEM
string.body: Gellmar's Wardstone;A protection stone that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_1F_Clodworm_ItemNM_52_Ae]. It creates a powerful barrier.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_KASPA_GROUPSLEEP_ITEM
string.body: Neith's Sleepstone;A marble that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElim_2F_Octaside_KeyNM_52_Ae]. It puts nearby enemies to sleep.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80002a
string.body: Desirable Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental1st_18_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA21], or [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA146]. Who knows why they have it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80003a
string.body: Lovely Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim2Wp_24_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Skeleton_24_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DIC_M_DigCherubimL_24_n]. Odd thing for them to carry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80004a
string.body: Bobbling Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MutaREBig_39_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadLightFi_40_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Spectre_44_An]. Would they really need such a thing?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80005a
string.body: Cute Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_11_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental2ndD_18_An]. Where would they redeem it, though?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80006a
string.body: Nifty Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SpakleRe2D_21_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ZombieFarmerD_23_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ZaifUndeadD_23_An]. Try to imagine them wearing such a headband!

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80007a
string.body: Cool Headband Coupon;A coupon that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MerdionWhiteD_38_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UndeadDarkFiD_39_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CuresD_40_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CuresD_42_An]. You had no idea monsters enjoyed headbands.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21277a
string.body: Stigma Research Diary;A diary carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_W_C5_DrakanPr_Re_lab_55_An]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF4_C4_DrakanPr_lab_54_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_21277b
string.body: Document Reagent;Used to restore severely damaged documents. It can be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Thuth].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80016a
string.body: Portzebnerk's Sock;A sock stolen by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_ShugoSantaD_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80017a
string.body: Dirty Socks;Used by Sonaran. Stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_ShugoSantaD_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80018a
string.body: Rangidax's Sock;Socks stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_Rudolph_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80019a
string.body: Filthy Sock;Socks stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_XmasEvent_Rudolph_99_n]. They were dragged around on the ground and became dirty as a result.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_POTION_HP_MP_40A
string.body: Pumpkin Lollipop;A favorite snack of the Pumpkin King. As the Shulack Sugarcrooks gave them all away to monsters that passed by, you can find them by hunting monsters anywhere in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_NEWYEAR_3STATS
string.body: New Year Leek Dumpling;A festive snack from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_POTION_HP_MP_40A
string.body: New Year Bulgogi;A festive dish from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FOOD_DPHEAL_30A
string.body: New Year Cordial;A festive drink from the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A]. It is consumed in Atreia on New Year's Day.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_NEWYEAR_01A
string.body: New Year Lunch Box;It contains [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_FOOD_NEWYEAR_3STATS]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_POTION_HP_MP_40A], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_NEWYEAR_FOOD_DPHEAL_30A]. You can get it by hunting monsters anywhere in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_20A
string.body: Beritra's Gaze;A very rare [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. Those who have attracted the attention of Lord Beritra would be wise to get rid of it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_30A
string.body: Israphel's Glory;A [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. You can accept the patronage of Lord Israphel, or gamble for a better fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_40A
string.body: Siel's Gift;A [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. You can accept the patronage of Lady Siel, or gamble for a better fortune.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_LUNAR_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_50A
string.body: Aion's Grace;A very rare [%dic:STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01]. Most people would be happy to have Aion watch over them, but some think they can do even better...

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_LUNAR_01
string.body: Charm Card;Given out by the Fayrefolk [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Lotus] in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA31] and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Metrano] in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DC1_3]. Who will be influencing your destiny in the year to come?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3331A
string.body: Poisonous Stinger;A putrid and poisonous thorn that can be obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Mudthorn_33_An] and used as an ingredient for antidotes.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3336A
string.body: Amberous Horn;The reddish horns of the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_hippolizardRe_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3337A
string.body: Amberous Horn Ornament;A glowing red trinket made from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_hippolizardRe_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3535A
string.body: Kerubiel Belt;A leather belt you can obtain from the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim3_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3536A
string.body: Kerubiel Dagger;A thin dagger that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Cherubim4_33_An] carries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3537A
string.body: Iron Tail;The hard tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Varanus_33_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3537B
string.body: Mottled Tail;A tail with the pattern of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Varanus_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3539A
string.body: Bloodwing Claw;A sharp claw that you can obtain from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_BATRe2_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3540A
string.body: Fragrant Mushroom;A delicious-smelling mushroom growing on some [%dic:STR_DIC_M_XipetoMove_34_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3542A
string.body: Rotten Bandage;Disgusting bandages that were wrapped over the rotting wounds of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Zombie_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3544A
string.body: Thick Troll Leather;Hardened flesh taken from the hide of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_TrollRE_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4327A
string.body: Laupede's Poison Thorn;A venemous thorn obtained from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_CentipedeD_30_An]. It can be used as a powerful weapon to kill Worgs.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4328A
string.body: Vespine Crystal;An amber crystal found on the body of certain [%dic:STR_DIC_M_VespaReD_32_n]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4331A
string.body: Original Plans;Details of Adhis' plan that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg2_32_An] seems to have stolen.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4331B
string.body: Duplicate Plans;Details of Mirka's plan that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Sprigg3_33_An] seems to have taken.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4332A
string.body: Gem Fragments;A jeweled object that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_STR_CyclopsD_35_An] grows inside its hot body.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4333A
string.body: Flame Fungie's Heart;The beating vital organ of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FireFungyRe2D_34_An]. It can keep a fire burning for quite a long time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4334A
string.body: Virago's Bracelet;The bracelet that a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_HarpyD_34_An] wears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4530A
string.body: Caltrops Gem;A very expensive Amethyst carried by an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_MimicAmethystD_32_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4535A
string.body: Karnif Hide;Extremely tough leather from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KalnifReD_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4538A
string.body: Nerita's Letter;A letter that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Nerthus] wrote for the refugees.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_3930a
string.body: Drana Crystal;Drana that has been processed for convenience. You can either obtain it from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Ship_Li] or buy it from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_LC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4934a
string.body: Heavy Surkana;The power source used by the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_Ship_Da]. It can be purchased from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shulack_DC1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30401A
string.body: Magic Stone;A stone formed by the Spirits of Elementis Forest and entrusted to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Farmer_60_Al]. It contains the power to break through Argent Manor's Aetheric Field.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30407A
string.body: Magic Cage;A cage designed to trap [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_ElementalLightM_60_Ah]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30408A
string.body: Golem's Heart;A stone pulsing with the life-force of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Golem_Ranger_60_Ah]. There are legends that it has transformative powers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B
string.body: Large Golem Heart;A stone fairly bursting with the life-force of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Golem_Melee_60_Ah]. Legends claim it has remarkable transformative powers.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A
string.body: Cadella's Light;An eerie, glowing sphere created by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_Butler_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30415A
string.body: Illusion Crystal;A strange crystal whose facets show images that aren't really there. It may be responsible for creating the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_RollingStone_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30421A
string.body: Miniature Terma;A small rock that looks like [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDElementalN_Nmd_RollingStone_60_Al].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q18408a
string.body: Broken Blade Fragment;Pieces of the broken Blade of Tiamat's Power. It is rumored that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_01_BionicCPU_53_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_02_DrakanRa_Named_54_Ah], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamed_55_Ah] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF4Re_Dra_03_DrakanNamedFail_55_Ah] hold pieces.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_JUNK_Q_IDSTATION
string.body: Balaur Marble;An exotic marble found on enemies around the Aturam Sky Fortress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18306a
string.body: Sky Fortress Supplies;Materials to make life run more smoothly for those on the floating island. Kept in the Sky Fortress' Supply Zone, you can get them from a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Worker_58_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemFi_Test_58_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Worker_58_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_GolemKn_Test_58_n], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackFi_58_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_01_ShulackPr_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18307a
string.body: Stamped Box;A box in the Aturam Sky Fortress Warehouse Zone. It bears a Balaur stamp, meaning it contains Reian Tribe relics.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18308a
string.body: Ereshkigal's Seal;Proof that the Shulacks working in the Aturam Sky Fortress are connected to Ereshkigal. You can find it on a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackKn_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackAs_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_02_ShulackWi_58_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_IronGolem_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18309a
string.body: Generator Shard;A piece of a destroyed Dredgion Generator.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18312a
string.body: Surveillance Resonator;A Balaur machine designed to detect enemies in the Aturam Sky Fortress. You can obtain it from an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Alret_Broad_58_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_Alret_Recall_58_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDStation_IronGolem_58_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Scroll_30505
string.body: Torn Scroll;A scroll found in the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_ZONE_NAME_IDYun]. It has been ripped in two.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30506A
string.body: Torn Scroll Piece;The second part of the scroll written by Merops, warden of Rentus Base. It is in the possession of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_DrakanWi_60_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30510A
string.body: Engagement Ring;A ring given to Enetia by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Autiron] as a token of his love. A [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_DrakanStrider_60_Ae] has it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30513A
string.body: Balaur Bow;A bow-and-arrow set used by skilled [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_DrakanRider_60_Ae]. How many Daevas have been wounded by its wicked arrows?

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30560A
string.body: Siel's Insignia;A keepsake that Urus' father always kept close to his heart. It is now in the possession of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDYun_DrakanStrider_60_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30511A
string.body: Vasharti Seal;A seal carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Q30511_ALL]aries to display their loyalties.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_CHILDREN_SCROLL_SHIELD_ALL_30A
string.body: Paper Scale;A material needed to mend Koinobori. It can be found in Haramel, Nochsana Training Camp, Kromede's Trial, Fire Temple, Steel Rake, and Dark Poeta.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80042A
string.body: Green Plank;A component for building a sailing ship, stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA144]s, [%dic:STR_DIC_MLA17_3]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FrillfaimamA_14_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80043A

string.body: Red Plank;A tool for marking a picnic spot, stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_34_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth2_34_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth2_35_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80050A
string.body: Commemorative Lantern;A floating lamp stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An]...and donated by Pauno's Bakery, not that Pauno'd let you forget.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80051A
string.body: Shining Lantern;A floating lamp already on the water for many days before being stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80052A
string.body: Guiding Lantern;A floating lamp said to guide Lady Lumiel's wisdom in distributing Aether, it's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80053A
string.body: Wickless Lantern;A special lamp to attrack Lady Lumiel's attention. It's been solen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80054A
string.body: Floating Ribbon;A bouyant ribbon that supports floating candles for the Festival of Light. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80055A
string.body: Sinking Ribbon;A Floating Ribbon nearing the end of its days, this bouyant support for a floating candle probably only has a day or two left before it splashes to the bottom. Stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An]s, it may not get the chance to finish out the Festival of Light.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80056A
string.body: Sailing Ribbon;A bouyant ribbon that supports floating lamps for the Festival of Light. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80057A
string.body: Waterlogged Ribbon;A Sailing Ribbon that's been on the water a while. It's been stolen by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Gumi_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80058A
string.body: Strange Herb;A leafy herb stolen from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Isolde] by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_ElementalFire2_LIGHT_99_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80064A

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN2011_LIGHT
string.body: Castings;The Occult High yearbook, which the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Shulackwizard_Light_99_n]s and other monsters have run off with, to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Blair]'s consternation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_HALLOWEEN2011_DARK
string.body: Castings;The Occult High yearbook, which the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Shulackwizard_Dark_99_n]s and other monsters have run off with, to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_Witchta]'s consternation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_WINTER2011_FOOD_HPREGEN_20A
string.body: Stunned Potcrab;Fight and subdue a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_15_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_25_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_35_An], or [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_Potcrab_45_An]--whichever provides a good challenge for your level.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_WORLD_EVENT_WINTER2011_FOOD_MPREGEN_20A

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80128A
string.body: Mysterious Reian Herb;The herb a particular Reian Tribesman has given to his [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_LIGHT_99_n]s so that they can go forth and make crab cakes. Supposedly, they make the best crab cakes on Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80129A
string.body: Reian Rations;The strange Reian food which [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Branch_Event_AncientClanFi_DARK_99_n]s carry so that they won't be tempted by the tasty crab cakes. One supposes that these are vegetarian, or at least don't contain crab.

string.name: STR_DIC_Q30459_All
string.body: Materials for the Ring;Materials needed for a ring that [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_01] designed. He hopes it will win [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_DF4a_02]'s heart. This exotic list includes [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B], and the Finest Accessory Flux.

string.name: STR_DIC_Q30410_All
string.body: Transformation Materials;Items [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Shugo_LF4a_01] requested, including [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410A], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30410B], and Finest Accessory Flux. She believes they can help her alter her physical form.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q19048A
string.body: Andreas' Manual;Andreas, a Preceptor of Emotion, lent you this book to help you learn how to be more expressive. Double-click to read.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Q29048A
string.body: Seriphim's Manual;Seriphim, a Preceptor of Emotion, lent you this book to help you learn how to be more expressive. Double-click to read.

string.body: Courage Insignia;A reward the Crucible Coliseum gives to new contestants.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_11060a
string.body: Violet Orb;An orb containing Kaisinel's orders. Defeat Omega and complete Omega's Fragment's first quest to receive more missions from the Violet Orb.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_21060a
string.body: Shining Scroll;A scroll containing Marchutan's orders. Defeat Ragnarok and complete the Shining Scroll's first quest to receive more missions from the Shining Scroll.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_COIN_ARENA_01
string.body: Crucible Insignia;A reward that the Empyrean Crucible and Crucible Challenge give to trainees.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80134b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Soil Spirits and Ironjaw Sparkles in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80134c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Sprigg Outlaws and Ice Slinks in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA09_1]. They smell blood.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136a
string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Vigilante Spirits and Healer Spirits wandering around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] drop these.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136b
string.body: Elyos Soul Fragment;The Grove Sylphens and Fluorescent Sparkies around [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP] drop these. They are fragments of the souls of unjustly murdered Daevas.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80136c
string.body: Energy of Greed;Energy you can obtain from the Armor Wing Sparkles and Munmun Gatherers near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_OP]. They smell blood.

string.body: Bloodstained Memento Box;The Spriggle Gatherers and Malek Drakes at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF3_SZ_A1] drop these.
