string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23520a
string.body: Confidential Intelligence Document;A Balaur document obtained during a battle against the Beritran Army. It contains information about the Beritran Army's activities and Elyos spies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528a
string.body: Ruins Expedition Report;A report prepared by Beritran Intelligence about the Devastated Region in the Idian Depths. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528b
string.body: Waterway Expedition Report;A report prepared by Beritran Intelligence about the Waterway Region in the Idian Depths. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23528c
string.body: Garrison Expedition Report;A report prepared by Beritran Intelligence about the Rata Army Garrison in the Idian Depths. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_under_Vri_Poison_Q_03].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529a
string.body: Witch's Ruling Ring;A ring kept by the witch Queen Modor. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529b
string.body: Condensed Core of Hyperion;A nucleus made of condensed Idgel. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDRuneWP_AncientArm_N_65_Al], the ancient weapon in the Infinity Shard.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529c
string.body: Vera Siege Ballista's Solid Parts;Parts of the specially designed Beritran Army siege weapon at Ophidan Bridge. They can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U1_UltimateSW_N_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23529d
string.body: Old Danuar Relic Chest;A Danuar Relic Chest hidden in the Danuar Sanctuary. It can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_VriIU_Wi_N_65_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16982a
string.body: The Danuar Head Priest's Tome;A Danuar relic obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_Vri_N_65_all]. It is written in Danuar and difficult to understand, but is rumored to describe how to use Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26982a
string.body: The Danuar Head Priest's Record;A Danuar relic obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U2_P_Vri_N_65_all]. It is written in Danuar and difficult to understand, but is rumored to describe how to use Idgel.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18913a
string.body: Ancient Weapon Blueprint;A ancient weapon design obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shugo_Nurse_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18914a
string.body: Rusted Weapon Parts;Parts removed from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine]. They may be useful for research on Idgel-based weaponry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18916a
string.body: Chief of Staff's Elaborate Seal;This item can obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Guardian_65_Ae2_Nmd]. Such seals are a mark of high-ranking members in the Beritran Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28913a
string.body: Ancient Weapon Design;A ancient weapon design obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Shugo_Nurse_65_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28914a
string.body: Corroded Weapon Parts;Parts removed from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_STR_IDVritra_FOBJ_Ancient_warmachine]. They may be useful for research on Idgel-based weaponry.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28916a
string.body: Chief of Staff's Detailed Seal;This item can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDVritra_Base_Drakan_Guardian_65_Ae2_Nmd]. Such seals are a mark of high-ranking members in the Beritran Army.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDLDF5b_TD_Map_Q28034
string.body: Katalam Invasion Operations Plan;A letter that details plans to conquer Katalam after the capture of The Eternal Bastion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5_idruneweapon_01
string.body: Infinity Shard Waykey;A crystal needed to enter Infinity Shard. Get the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller] for the Elyos, or from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller] for the Asmodians to craft this.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_ldf5_idunder_rune_01
string.body: Danuar Reliquary Waykey;A crystal needed to enter Danuar Reliquary. Get the design from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Lv11_SpecialSeller] for the Elyos, or from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5b_Dv11_SpecialSeller] for the Asmodians to craft this.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_pvp_01
string.body: Blood Mark;A mark of distinction for a Daeva who has contributed to a base conquest battle in Katalam or Danaria.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_a
string.body: The Catacombs Key;In the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. It opens the The Catacombs Entrance… until it disappears

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_b
string.body: The Crypts Key;In the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. It opens the The Crypts… until it disappears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_key_Idldf5_Under_02_start_c
string.body: The Charnels Key;In the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_OBJ_IDF5_U2_E_Box_Start]. It opens the The Charnels…until it disappears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_18931a
string.body: Ashunatal Supplies;A box containing legion supplies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_28931a
string.body: Ashunatal Legion Supplies;A box containing legion supplies.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01
string.body: Sillus Marble;Combine [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03] to make [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. When you participate in the Sillus Fortress Battle, the Sillus Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 1 and the Sillus Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 2 become available. You can obtain them with this reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02
string.body: Silona Marble;Combine [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03] to make [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. When you participate in the Silona Fortress Battle, the Silona Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 1 and the Silona Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 2 become available. You can obtain them with this reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03
string.body: Pradeth Marble;Combine [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] to make [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04]. When you participate in the Pradeth Fortress Battle, the Pradeth Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 1 and the Pradeth Fortress Assault Reward Box: Grade 2 become available. You can obtain them with this reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_fortress_04
string.body: Chaos Marble;Combine [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_01] and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_02] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_fortress_03] to make this marble. To obtain each of these marbles, you need to perform a remarkable feat in the Sillus, Silona, and Pradeth Fortress Battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDLDF5_TD_Door_01
string.body: Aetheric Power Crystal;The power source for the fortress defense cannons.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_IDLDF5_TD_Door_02
string.body: Mobile Turret Key;The key for the Beritran Mobile Turret.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist
string.body: Treasure Box Key;A key that opens the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_treasurebox]. It can be obtained by combining [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_01] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_01
string.body: Alchemic Essence;The essence of magic used by alchemists. Use this on a lead fragment to obtain a pouch containing the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_02
string.body: Lead Fragment;A piece of metal used by alchemists as their base ingredient. Convert it into the Alchemy Essence and obtain a pouch containing the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Key_Event_Alchemist].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Event_Alchemist_wrap
string.body: Alchemist's Pouch;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_Event_Alchemist_01]s use these to produce reactive materials. They are available throughout Atreia. A [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_02] or [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_Event_Alchemist_01] can be found inside of the pouch.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance
string.body: Mega Kinah Millions Ticket;A Mega Kinah Millions instant lottery ticket. Gently scratch off the silver area to see if you've won a prize.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_300
string.body: Mega Kinah Millions;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]s. Buy up to 10 a day for 1 million Kinah each. The Jackpot is a staggering 300 million Kinah. 2nd place wins 100 million, 3rd place wins 5 million, 4th place wins 1.5 million, and 5th place wins 10,000 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_100
string.body: Mega Kinah 100;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]. Buy up to 20 tickets a day for 100,000 Kinah each. The 1st prize winner receives a staggering 100 million Kinah. 2nd place wins 10 million, 3rd place wins 1 million, 4th place wins 250,000, and 5th place wins 100 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance_5
string.body: Mega Kinah 5;One of the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_item_Lotto_instance]. Buy up to 10 tickets a day for 1 million Kinah each. The 1st prize winner receives a staggering 5 million Kinah. 2nd place wins 2.2 million, 3rd place wins 1.3 million, 4th place wins 110,000, and 5th place wins 100 Kinah.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80405a
string.body: Burnt Zombie Soul;This item can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_ZombieQ_46_An] locked inside the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF2a_FOBJ_Q1092].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80424a
string.body: Nagarant Balaur's Blood Stain;Blood from a Nagarant Balaur. It can be obtained by defeating the Bakarma Legion Nagarants stationed in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_STR_DF3_SZ_H].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80438a
string.body: Colorful Arachna Sap;This sap can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_OctasideTigerD_46_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_l_bond
string.body: Shugo Warranty;A warranty issued by a Shugo. It can be obtained by investing ice in Scrooge. Shugos are very sensitive about credit, but you can exchange this for an item of different value for a certain period of time after the Summer Party ends.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_junk_world_event_d_bond
string.body: Shugo Warranty;GUARANTEED! Invest in ice now;get something shiny when the Summer Party ends.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_ice_piece
string.body: Ice Block;Monsters and bosses in all level 30+ instances have a chance of dropping these. They must be broken into manageable pieces using an [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_icehammer_piece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_icehammer_piece
string.body: Ice Pick;Monsters and bosses in all level 30+ instances have a chance of dropping these. They are used to break up [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_world_event_ice_piece]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30041
string.body: Noble Cipher-Blade Components;Siel's Supreme Cipher-Blade and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30250_All
string.body: Blessed Cipher-Blade Components;Materials needed to craft a great weapon: [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_Rudra_Essence_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30235a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Blessed_Aurium_01], and the Noble Siel's Supreme Cipher-Blade.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_30141
string.body: Noble Cipher-Blade Components;Siel's Supreme Cipher-Blade and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Insidium_01_dark]. Forging the two together unlocks the weapon's hidden power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16992a
string.body: Dynatoum's Board;A board carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U3_Boss_N_65_Ah] containing information on the infiltration of the Illuminary Obelisk. It is the pinnacle of the Beritra Legion's Ide portal technology.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26992a
string.body: Dynatoum's Circuit;A circuit carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF5_U3_Boss_N_65_Ah] containing information on the infiltration of the Illuminary Obelisk. It is the pinnacle of the Beritra Legion's Ide portal technology.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4338a
string.body: Spiner Tail;The tail of a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LobsterReD_25_An]. It's black and shiny and very tough.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4338b
string.body: Cursed Necklace;It is said that anyone who owns this necklace will gain a great fortune. However, it is imbued with a terrible curse that makes its owner lose all their loved ones, and forces them to live alone for the rest of their life.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_4542c
string.body: Aika's Key;A key you can obtain by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_SeirenNamedDQ_44_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9562a
string.body: [Event] Katalam Informer's Clue;A clue in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_03] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9563a
string.body: [Event] Gelkmaros Informer's Clue;A clue in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_02] in Gelkmaros.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9564a
string.body: [Event] Katalam Informer's Clue;A clue in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_03] in Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_9565a
string.body: [Event] Inggison Informer's Clue;A clue in the possession of [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Event_Shulack_As_01] in Inggison.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3547a
string.body: Contaminated Elim Crystal;Crystals obatinable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_36_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3340a
string.body: Assault Orders;An order containing encrypted information about the operation to destroy the Lepharist Bastion. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LehparKn_40_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_3548a
string.body: Synthetic Scale;This can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ID5R_PerfectWaBossQ_45_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_11304a
string.body: Balauric Orders;A written order carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDCatacombsH_DrakanMonkBossNmd_55_Ah].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24090a
string.body: Riftsands;A device made by the Protector that enables user to time travel to the past. It has the appearance of a golden hourglass.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24095a
string.body: Golden Hourglass;A device made by the Protector that enables users to time travel to the present. It has the appearance of a golden hourglass.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24081b
string.body: Fragment of Gravity;A fragment that can be obtained by destroying the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF4b_T2_Monster_Q20061A] around the Heart of Gravity.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24080a
string.body: Idgel Purification Device Component;A component from the Idgel purification device. It emanates with the power of Ide.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24071b
string.body: Corrupted Idgel Cleanser;A device that emanates with the power of Ide. It's seemingly damaged and currently not in operation.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24071a
string.body: Zayedan's Record Tablet;An old and worn-looking stone tablet detached from the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_FOBJ_DefenderRecord]. It has a divine presence about it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24070a
string.body: Corrupted Idgel Cleanser;A device that emanates with the power of Ide. It can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q20050all]

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24030a
string.body: Divinity Essence;An orb created before the Cataclysm. It is filled with divine blessing and can be obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF2A_TesinonSeamanNMDQ_50_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24051c
string.body: Port Key;The key to a secret port. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KeA_LehparKnD_37_Ae]s and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KnA_LehparKnD_37_An]s.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24062a
string.body: Suspicious Balauric Object;A suspicious object carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF4_Drakan_vilall], engraved with a mark resembling a device built by Dragonbound in Mitrakand.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24012B
string.body: Black Claw Hairpin;A hairpin from the MuMu and the Black Claw tribe. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_13_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_11_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_11_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanWarriorM_13_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24012C
string.body: Mumu Belt;A belt worn by the MuMu and obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererM_11_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_13_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_RatmanGathererMS_11_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24013a
string.body: Hunter's Poison;A colorless, odorless liquid. It must be used in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_13].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24014a
string.body: Abija's Staff;Once used by High Spellshifter Abija. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanShamanSNamed_19_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021a
string.body: Archon's Ancient Weapon;A weapon used by Asmodians following the Cataclysm. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightFiD_26_An], [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightHighFiD_26_An], and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_UNdeadLightWiD_26_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021b
string.body: Archon's Ancient Armor;Armor used by Asmodians after the Cataclysm. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Undeaddark_qDNamedQ_28_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24021c
string.body: Herb of Repose;A mixture of various herbal powders. Sprinkling it on the ground between the two pillars of the tower at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_B1_2] can placate the spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023a
string.body: Wind Key;The [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Elementalwater3NMDQ_31_An] has it. You need this key to get into the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_2] of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023b
string.body: Fire Key;A key that the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalEarth3NamedD_32_Ae] has. It is the key to open the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDDF2Flying_SUB_3] of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_C5].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023c
string.body: Abyss Key;A key that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_ElementalFire4NamedQ_33_Ae] has. You need this key to get into the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023all
string.body: Keys;Refers to the [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023a], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023b], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023c].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031a
string.body: Munin's Dimension Investigation Device;A device that examines whether an Abyss Gate is active. It must be used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031b
string.body: Aurtri's Dimension Investigation Device;A device that examines whether an Abyss Gate is active. It must be used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24031c
string.body: Tyr's Dimension Investigation Device;A device that examines whether an Abyss Gate is active. It must be used at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_ItemUseArea_Q24031].

string.body: Anoramas's Essence;A dry brown fruit..

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24052b
string.body: Triminos's Essence;A red fruit covered with a glossy shell.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24052c
string.body: Etun's Essence;A transparent glassy lump.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14014a
string.body: Plumis Transformation Potion;A potion given to you by Estino. You must use it at the entrance of [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA22] ..

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14014b
string.body: Ancient Stone Fragment;A refined fragment obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_37001all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14015a
string.body: Tursin Krall's Mark;An insignia taken from Krall armor found in [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14016a
string.body: Balaur Seal;A seal carried by a Balaur captain in the Sealed Space. It can destroy the [%dic:STR_DIC_E_14].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023a
string.body: Lightning Wall Fragment;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A fragment of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall obtainable from Venomous Skyrays or Spying Skyrays.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023b
string.body: Wave Wall Fragment;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A fragment of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall obtainable from Crouching Eracus Gargoyles.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023c
string.body: Wind Wall Fragment;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A fragment of the[%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall obtainable from the Draft Spirits, Strong Sandstorm Spirits, or Swift Sandstorm Spirits.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14023d
string.body: Fire Wall Fragment;[%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_14023_all]. A fragment of the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF2_SZ_C3] wall that is obtainable from the Alluring Temptress or Enticing Temptress.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14024a
string.body: Gardugu's Report;A firsthand report on the Kaidan Krall written by Gardugu. You can obtain it by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2Krall_28_all].

string.body: Balaur Marching Plans;A secret document obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_KrallScoutHK_36_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14026a
string.body: Mabangtah's Secret Remedy;A special remedy given to you by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_NPC_Mabangta].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14030a
string.body: Guardian's Essence;An essence of protective power.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031a
string.body: Poeta Ide Detection Device;A device that can detect regions in Poeta containing high concentrations of Ide. It can be operated near [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031b
string.body: Verteron Ide Detection Device;A device that can detect regions in Verteron containing high concentrations of Ide. It can be operated near [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF1a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14031c
string.body: Eltnen Ide Detection Device;A device that can detect regions in Eltnen containing high concentrations of Ide. It can be operated near [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Dragonpotal_LF2].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14043a
string.body: Balaur Language Potion;A potion that allows you to speak Balaur.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14043b
string.body: Asmodian Airship Design;An airship design drawn by Asmodians.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14046a
string.body: Stone of Black Embers;A stone of ember that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Ab1_1141_RottenTreeB_29_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14051a
string.body: Agrint Root Sample;A root sample that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Agrint_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14051b
string.body: Rotron Root Sample;A root sample that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Rottentree_34_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052a
string.body: Kalkas' Bone Pieces;Some of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadVigilante_Q1055]'s bones.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052b
string.body: Mempion's Bones Pieces;Some of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadHerdboy_Q1055]'s bones.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052c
string.body: Spinas' Bone Pieces;Some of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadMaid_Q1055]'s bones.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052d
string.body: Ladon's Bone Pieces;Some of [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UndeadFarmer_Q1055]'s bones.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14052e
string.body: Urn of the Deceased;The jar that contains the bones of Kalkas, Mempion, Spina, and Ladon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14053a
string.body: Dimensional Gate Invasion Plan;A document detailing the Balaur's invasion plan using dimensional gates.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14062a
string.body: Hanarkand's Clue;An engraved Ide that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF4_C5_Drakan_Ae_all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14070a
string.body: Sarpan's Clue;A contaminated Idgel purification device that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4a_Q10050all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14071a
string.body: Zayedan's Record Fragment;One of the scattered fragments of the [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4a_FOBJ_DefenderRecord]. It seems to be a relic from the ancient times.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14071b
string.body: Corrupted Idgel Cleanser;A device that purifies unusable Idgel so that it can be used again. However, the device itself has been contaminated and no longer operates.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14080a
string.body: Tiamaranta's Clue;A component of the Idgel purification device that can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_Q14080all].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14081a
string.body: Detector Core;This core uses [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF4B_ItemUseArea_Q10060A] to activate [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_MagicAmp].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090a
string.body: Riftsands;An hourglass given to you by Protector Oriata. It enables users to travel back in time.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090b
string.body: Crumbled Ide Crystal;An Ide crystal obtainable by investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_TiamatDie].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14090c
string.body: Fragmented Ide Crystal;An Ide crystal obtainable by investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_IdPiece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14091a
string.body: Kaisinel's Mark;A mark granted by Kaisinel, the Lord of Illusion. It is an important item that will validate your identity.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24022b
string.body: Red Abex Meat;Fresh meat with a vivid red color obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_FethlotNmD_28_n]. You must take it to the Altar of Trial and roast it in the bonfire.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24025a
string.body: Aether Key;A key that [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWiSilverNamedQ_39_Ae] has. It has the power to open the Mist Manes' Abyss Gate.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24081a
string.body: Ide Monitoring Device;A core used at the Heart of Wrath to activate [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4b_FOBJ_MagicAmp].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14044a
string.body: Temporal Stone;A magic stone used to activate artifacts, obtainable through alchemic crafting.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24090b
string.body: Extracted Ide Fragment;An Ide crystal fragment that can be obtained by investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_TiamatDie].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24090c
string.body: Fragmented Ide Shard;An Ide crystal fragment that can be obtained by investigating [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_IDTiamat_FOBJ_IdPiece].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24091a
string.body: Marchutan's Mark;A mark engraved on the symbol of Empyrean Lord Marchutan. It represents the Empyrean Lord's power and authority.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_80539a
string.body: Ironwall Seal;You can obtain this seal from a treasure chest once you attain an S rank at the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDLDF5b_TD].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_promotion_vip_continue_coin
string.body: Prestige Coin;A coin that only Daevas with an active Prestige Pass can obtain. It can be acquired by staying in Atreia or vanquishing monsters.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_24023d
string.body: Water Chamber Key;The key that Bulagan has. It can open the [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_toIDDF2flying].

string.name: STR_DIC_l_quest_80546a
string.body: Flowers;These are beautiful flowers. Take them to Florarinerk and she will package them in a nice flower basket for you.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_event_wday_flower_bouquet
string.body: Flower Bouquet;A bouquet of beautiful flowers. You can receive it from Florarinerk.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_wday_chocobox
string.body: Chocolate Box;A box of delicious chocolates for men.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_wday_flowerbasket
string.body: Flower Basket;A basket of beautiful flowers for women.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_quest_80550a
string.body: Flowers;These are beautiful flowers. Take them to Florarinerk and she will package them in a nice flower basket for you.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1858a
string.body: Elite Archon's Cloak;A red cloak worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_wi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1859a
string.body: Elite Archon's Flag;A flag held by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Da_fi]. Asmodian wings and helmet are embroidered on a red background.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1860a
string.body: Elite Archon's Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_ra] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_wi]. The insignia can be pinned onto clothing.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1861a
string.body: Elite Archon's Weapon;The weapon used by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Da_fi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1862a
string.body: Elite Archon's Insignia;An insignia worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_ra], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_gu], and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_wi]. It features a shield and a sword embroidered in red thread.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_1863a
string.body: Elite Archon's Kisk;A Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Da_fi]. It features a pair of purple wings.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2858a
string.body: Elite Guardian's Cloak A yellow cloak worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_gu] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_wi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2859a
string.body: Krotan Guardian Flag;A flag held by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1221_guard_Li_fi]. Complex patterns of orange and green are embroidered on its black background.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2860a
string.body: Elite Guardian's Crest;A round badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_ra] and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_wi]. Thorny vines are embroidered along its edge.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2861a
string.body: Defender's Crest;A gold shield-shaped badge worn by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1231_guard_Li_fi].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2862a
string.body: Elite Guardian's Crest;An emblem engraved on the epaulet of [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_ra], [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_gu], and [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_wi]. It is embroidered with castle gates and spears.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_2863a
string.body: Elite Guardian's Kisk;A small Kisk carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_E_1241_guard_Li_fi]. A lady with bluish green wings is engraved on it.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_event_opportunity_snowball
string.body: Snowflake Crystal;A crystal obtained after failing to enchant a [%dic:STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a]. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugom_snow] is trading snowballs for ten of these.

string.name: STR_DIC_l_world_wrap_event_snowball_01a
string.body: Snowball;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_event_shugof_snow] makes these and gives them away to Daevas. You can enchant it by double-clicking it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14150a
string.body: Engraved Stone Tablet;A stone wall carving that depicts an ancient civilization.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14152a
string.body: Lepharist Poison Sample;A sample of the biological poison being researched by the Lepharist Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13800a
string.body: Atmis' Letter;A letter received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_Atmos_E]. It is addressed to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF5_OP1_ZoneTeleport_L].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13806a
string.body: Broken Power Cell;Beritra Army power cell obtainable from an [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A5_Vritramachine]. It is faulty and unusable. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E] wants this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13807a
string.body: Scorched Flame Sample;A sample obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C2_ElementalFire3_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809a
string.body: Shell Ember;A mysterious shell obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_a]. It looks severely scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809b
string.body: Brittle Outer Scale;A badly burnt piece of skin. It is obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_b]. It looks severely scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13809c
string.body: Crimson Bloodstain;A mysterious bloodstain obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_c]. It has been extremely burned and blackened.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13810a
string.body: Danuar Record Plate;A Danuar artifact obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_Statue_Rune_65_An]. It appears to be a stone plate on which the Danuar recorded their past.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_13812a
string.body: Vasharti Order;A secret document obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Fi_65_An_Q]. It seems to have been sent by an officer in the Beritra Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23800a
string.body: Haldor's Letter;A letter received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_Haldor_E]. It is addressed to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF5_OP1_ZoneTeleport_D].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23806a
string.body: Damaged Power Cell;A Beritra Army power cell obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine]. Its functions are faulty and unusable. [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E] wants this item.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23807a
string.body: Scorched Blaze Sample;A sample obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_C1_ElementalFire3_65_An].

string.body: Cindery Shell;A mysterious shell obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_a]. It looks severely scorched.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23809b
string.body: Ashen Outer Scale;A badly burnt piece of skin. It is obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23809c
string.body: Scarlet Bloodstain;A mysterious bloodstain obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_B1_DeadTree_c]. It has been extremely burned and blackened.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23810a
string.body: Danuar Archive;A Danuar artifact obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_E_LDF5_Fortress_Statue_Rune_65_An]. It appears to be a stone plate on which the Danuar recorded their past.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_23812a
string.body: Vasharti Orders;A secret document obtainable from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_A3_TR_Wi_65_An_Q]. It seems to have been sent by an officer in the Beritra Legion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_DOC_QUEST_10100a
string.body: Kahrun's Drawing;A drawing illustrated by Kahrun. It depicts a mysterious device.

string.body: Kahrun's Illustration;A drawing illustrated by Kahrun. It depicts a mysterious device.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10100b
string.body: Ide Detector;A device received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Hyunmurung_E]. It is a single-use device that locates high concentrations of Ide in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20100b
string.body: Ide Sensor;A device received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF5_Fortress_Muderungrung_E]. It is a single-use device that locates high concentrations of Ide in Kaldor.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_10101a
string.body: Invasion Brief;A secret document obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_Noble_L_QNmd_65_An]. It seems to detail the Beritra Army's invasion plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_20101a
string.body: Invasion Brief;A secret document obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Vritra_Noble_D_QNmd_65_An]. It seems to detail the Beritra Army's invasion plan.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_14201a
string.body: Calydon Scroll;A scroll carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LF2A_CalydonMageNamed_50_Q_An]. It is a written record of the Calydons and their giant Petraliths.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14110a
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol;A symbol known to be carried by the Lephar Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14113a
string.body: Icon of Kaisinel;A gift of blessing for those on the Great Pilgrimage. It can be obtained by killing the Krall guarding the road between [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA20] and [%dic:STR_DIC_FLA23].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14120a
string.body: Kerubian Fresh Water Bucket;A bucket containing clean, uncontaminated water drawn from under the falls at the Swamp Fountainhead.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_14121a
string.body: Revolutionary Symbol;A symbol known to be carried by the Lephar Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24113a
string.body: Tiamat's Sword;A sword dropped by a Balaur Brigade General during the Millennium War. It was once in the hands of the Lephar Revolutionaries.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_24122a
string.body: Pagimkin's Report;A report obtainable from an [%dic:STR_DIC_E_DF2_Book_Q24122] next to Pagimkin's corpse in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF2_SUB_D5_ID].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24121a
string.body: Sealed Goblet;A goblet carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_TreasureGuardianQ_36_Ae].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114a
string.body: Umkata's Bones;A piece of bone that can wake Umkata. It is carried by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanWarriorS_18_Ae] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LycanHunterS_17_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114b
string.body: Umkata's Earrings;An accessory that can wake Umkata. It should be inside [%dic:STR_DIC_E_20] and hidden in [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_25].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_24114c
string.body: Umkata's Weapon;A weapon that can wake Umkata. It is said to have been stolen by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental1stD_18_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_AElemental2ndD_18_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16940a
string.body: Dimension Research Journal;A research journal in which the Balaur recorded their work on new dimensional technology in the Linkgate Foundry. It is carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_DrakanMage_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26940a
string.body: Dimension Research Records;A research journal in which the Balaur recorded their work on new dimensional technology in the Linkgate Foundry. It is carried by a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDLDF4_Re_01_DrakanMage_Wi_65_An].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_24111a
string.body: Lepharist Primer;A secret document of the Lephar Revolutionaries. It is obtainable from the 'Suspicious Document' inside a house near [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF1A_5_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13708a
string.body: Proximity Alarm;An alarm that explodes and sends out a warning when Asmodians approach it. Install it around [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF4_Advance_Out_DF4].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13400a
string.body: Infiltration Sensor;A sensor that detects signs of a Beritra Army infiltration. Use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13401a
string.body: Infiltration Detector;A detector that senses signs of a Beritra Army infiltration. Use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13401].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13402a
string.body: Preserved Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_1]. It has been pretty well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the Beritra Army records stored in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13402b
string.body: Conserved Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_L_2]. It has been pretty well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the Beritra Army records stored in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23400a
string.body: Invasion Sensor;A sensor that detects signs of a Beritra Army infiltration. Use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13400].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23401a
string.body: Invasion Detector;A detector that senses signs of a Beritra Army invasion. Use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LDF5b_E_invisible_Q13401].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23402a
string.body: Intact Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_1]. It has been pretty well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the Beritra Army records stored in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_23402b
string.body: Undamaged Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5b_FOBJ_A4_Vritramachine_D_2]. It has been pretty well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the Beritra Army records stored in it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13901a
string.body: Danuar Reliquary Courage Insignia;A mark obtained by defeating [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Under_Rune_FrostNmd_2_N_Ma_65_Ah_ver47] in Infernal Danuary Reliquary.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13901b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13903a
string.body: Levinshor Occupation Report;A report obtained by combining [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_01], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_02], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_03], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_04].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_01
string.body: Northern Levinshor Occupation Report;A report obtained after carrying out a mission to defeat the enemy Warcaptains of 3 bases located in northern Levinshor. Written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_02
string.body: Eastern Levinshor Occupation Report;A report obtained after carrying out a mission to defeating the enemy Warcaptains of 3 bases located in eastern Levinshor. Written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_03
string.body: Southern Levinshor Occupation Report;A report obtained after carrying out a mission to defeat the enemy Warcaptains of 3 bases located in southern Levinshor. Written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_04
string.body: Western Levinshor Occupation Report;A report obtained after carrying out a mission to defeat the enemy Warcaptains of 3 bases located in western Levinshor. Written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Assembly_quest_light_LDF4Adv_05
string.body: Asmodian Advance Post Report;A report obtained after defeating the Asmodian Warcaptains of 5 advance posts located in Levinshor. Written by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF4_Advance_Elger_E].

string.body: Crimson Temple Orb;An orb obtained by acquiring Rank 2 or higher from attacking [%dic:STR_DIC_W_DF4_SZ_3021_A].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25031b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25062a
string.body: Shining Blue Crystal Fragments;Crystal fragments that glow in blue. They seem to emanate mysterious energy. The fragments can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_Comad_60_An] and [%dic:STR_DIC_M_DF5_F_ElementalWater1_61_n].

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_4
string.body: High Grade White Snowball;A high grade snowball that Daeva made by trimming the [%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] for 3 times. It must be painful when hit by it.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_5
string.body: Highest Grade White Snowball;The highest grade snowball that Daeva made by trimming the [%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] for 4 times. It doesn't look like a snowball any more.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2014xmas_snow_10
string.body: Legendary White Snowball;A legendary snowball that Daeva made by trimming the [%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1] for 5 times. Its story is handed down only in a legend.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2014xmas_ice_coin
string.body: Ice Crystal;A crystal generated by Daeva failing to adjust the trimming intensity of the [%dic:STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1].

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_event_2014xmas_snow_1
string.body: White Snowball;A snowball used by the Shugo Scarf Group. With Daeva's trimming, it can become far stronger.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403a
string.body: Infiltration Sensor;A sensor that detects signs of a Balaur infiltration. It might be good to use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LF1a_invisible_Q13403a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403b
string.body: Infiltration Detector;A detector that senses signs of a Balaur infiltration. It might be good to use it at [%dic:STR_DIC_N_E_LF1a_invisible_Q13403b].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403c
string.body: Preserved Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Vritramachine_L_1]. It has been relatively well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the records that the Balaur stored in the circuit.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_13403d
string.body: Intact Circuit;A circuit found in [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LF1a_FOBJ_Vritramachine_L_2]. It has been relatively well preserved, so it might be possible to analyze the records that the Balaur stored in the circuit.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_wrap_l_q_65deva_03a
string.body: Honorable Conqueror's Mark Bundle;Requires 40 [%dic:STR_DIC_I_coin_named_02] for one bundle. Elyos can make this bundle with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LF4_OP_L_exchange_namedcoin_01]. Asmodians can make this bundle with [%dic:STR_DIC_N_DF4_OP_D_exchange_namedcoin_01]. The Honorable Conqueror's Mark Bundle can be made via the quest tab in the Merchant store.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_4
string.body: King Card;One of the cards that can help create a Golden Card. Collect [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_1], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_2], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_3], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_4], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_5] to make a Golden Card.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_5
string.body: Ace Card;One of the cards that can help create a Golden Card. Collect [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_1], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_2], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_3], [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_4], and [%dic:STR_DIC_I_assembly_ldice_card_5] to make a Golden Card.

string.name: STR_DIC_WORLD_INDUN_LUNADEF_JUNK_01
string.body: Bright Aether;Can be obtained from an Unstable Aether Energy and used on the Defense Turret Platform to summon the desired weapon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_17540a
string.body: Kexkra's Flesh;Part of Kexkra Prototype's unstable body tissue. It shows traces of having been distorted unnaturally through medical experiments.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_27540a
string.body: Kexkra's Corporeal Tissue;Piece of Kexkra Prototype's Corporeal being. It shows traces of having been distorted unnaturally through medical experiments.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18397a
string.body: Deactivated Blue Crystal;A golem crystal. It glows blue in the dark.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_28397a
string.body: Deactivated Blue Gemstone;A golem gemstone. It glows blue in the dark.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_18415a
string.body: Narha's Memory;Memories of Chief Administrator Surama's experiment subject.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_28415a
string.body: Narha's Memory;Memories of Chief Administrator Surama's experiment subject.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_item_absoluteexp_recovery_big
string.body: Naburu's Large Golden Apple;This apple helps with growth so you can gather a certain amount and take it to the Growth Support Manager to receive better growth support.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_doc_quest_30800a
string.body: Arena of Tenacity and You;A very thick guidebook to use in the Arena of Tenacity and Hall of Tenacity. Double-click the book in your [%dic:STR_DIC_I_quest_cube_01] to read it.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_newyear_firework_01
string.body: Firecrackers of Blessing;Firecrackers that are created only for a limited time naturally through the power of Aether. Can kill [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_newyear_year] at once.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_newyear_yearcoin_01
string.body: Red Leather of the Aggressive Yeonsu;Red leather that can be obtained by killing [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_newyear_year] with [%dic:STR_DIC_I_world_event_newyear_firework_01]. Bring it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_event_newyear_fufurin] at the big city to exchange it for a return present.

string.name: STR_DIC_event_comebackrabbit_component
string.body: Mark of the Bunny;Mark of the Red-eyed Bunny Legion. Can be obtained from some dungeons and [%dic:STR_DIC_Event_Chuseok_Rabbit_75_Live].

string.name: STR_DIC_cash_item_absoluteexp_recovery_live_big
string.body: Lodas' Large Gold Star;A High Grade Catalyst used by [%dic:STR_DIC_EVENT_Q50052] for alchemy. More powerful than regular Lodas' Gold Stars.

string.name: STR_DIC_cash_item_absoluteexp_recovery_big
string.body: Nabaru's Large Golden Apple;A High Grade Catalyst used by [%dic:STR_DIC_EVENT_Q50052] for alchemy. More powerful than regular Nabaru's Golden Apples.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_charm_01
string.body: Containment Charm;A trinket that can seal away an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster01].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_charm_02
string.body: Harrowing Containment Charm;A trinket that can seal away a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster02].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_scentbag_01
string.body: Sealed Sachet;A sachet containing an [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster01]. Hanging it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_event_fifth_tree] grants a reward!

string.name: STR_DIC_I_world_event_fifth_scentbag_02
string.body: Large Sealed Sachet;A sachet containing a [%dic:STR_DIC_M_world_event_fifth_monster02]. Hanging it from the [%dic:STR_DIC_N_world_event_fifth_tree] grants a reward!

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDEternity_War_WP
string.body: War Points;Points given to Daevas who achieved remarkable feats on the battlefield. Can be used to purchase war supplies from the War Supplies Quartermaster. Disappears once you leave the battlefield.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_IDEternity_War_Nectar
string.body: Dew of Life;This item is sold by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDEternity_War_ShugoSeller], and can retrieve the lost power of the Canyon Fairy Elb.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13968a
string.body: Core Fragment of the Remnants of Eternity;It seems the core fragment was a piece of the Trials of Eternity, and fell to [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War] on the day of the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_13978a
string.body: Artifact Core Fragment;It looks like the artifact core fragment discovered at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_IDEternity_War] is the cause of the strange phenomena at Evergale Canyon.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010a
string.body: Broken Armor Piece;A piece of armor from the Arrows of Freedom Detachment sent to investigate the Bastion of Souls. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDAb1_Ere_FOBJ_Broken_Armor_Q10010a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10010d

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20010b

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_16838a
string.body: Archives of the Abyss;A book containing records of the Abyss. It is said to contain some long-lost information....

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_26838a
string.body: The Tale of the Legendary Sorcerer;A book containing the story of the legendary sorcerer. The lore is an oral tradition in Atreia.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_15680a
string.body: Galim Twig;A twig that can be obtained from killing Galims. It is used to resurrect Galims.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_15680b
string.body: Shuket's Empty Bottle;A bottle received from Shuket to gather the Essence of Life required to resurrect Galims.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_25680a
string.body: Gurgan's Empty Bottle;A bottle received from Gurgan to gather the Highlands Essence required to complete his magic secret remedy.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Start_Coin_L
string.body: Mark of Growth (30 days);A mark given to new and returning Daevas. If you possess this mark, you can go on growth support quests.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Coin_Grow_Common_Coin
string.body: Coin of Growth;A coin given to new and returning Daevas. If you possess [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Start_Coin_L], you will receive them automatically depending on your login times.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Vip_Start_Coin_L
string.body: Shining Mark of Growth (60 days);A mark given to Premium Daevas. If you possess this mark, you can go on Premium growth support quests.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Coin_Grow_Premium_Coin
string.body: Shining Coin of Growth;A coin given to Premium Daevas. If you possess [%dic:STR_DIC_I_Item_Newbie_Vip_Start_Coin_L], you will receive them automatically depending on your login times.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_event_2017devaranger_medal

string.name: STR_DIC_world_test_padet_change_01
string.body: Crusher Boarding Device;A device that enables you to board Crusher, the fearsome weapon. Can only be used inside the Fire Temple.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_cash_idevent_s4_gold
string.body: Brilliant Gold Ingot;A brilliantly glowing gold ingot. Take it to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LC1_event_npc_idsolo_s4] to receive valuable rewards.

string.body: Burning Black Sulfur;Black sulfur that burns while releasing poisonous gases. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Sulphur_Q10110a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110b
string.body: Burning Heart;The heart of a creature born from the flames of Pregion. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_01_Q10110].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110c
string.body: Scorched Lava Sap;A lump of lava that trickled out of trees in the Scorched Land. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_LDF5_Fortress_FOBJ_Lava_Q10110a].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_10110d
string.body: Dividing Flames;Flames of creatures born from the flames of Pregion. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_M_LDF5_Fortress_Fre_Monster_02_Q10110].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_20112b
string.body: Asmodian Supply Box;A box containing supplies for Asmodian Daevas. Can be obtained from [%dic:STR_DIC_OBJ_Ab1_FOBJ_Supply_Box_Q10112a].

string.body: Candy Bomb;A powerful bomb that looks like candy. It was made by the Candy Galaxy Corporation. Can deal great damage to [%dic:STR_DIC_M_World_event_halloween_JOL_party].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_QUEST_80975a
string.body: Stolen Pumpkin;Contraband squash, necessary for Esta's magic stew! Can be obtained by defeating the [%dic:STR_DIC_M_World_event_halloween_JOL_party].

string.name: STR_DIC_coin_cash_idevent_s6

string.name: STR_DIC_event_2017hallo_quest_component
string.body: Ripe Pumpkin;An ingredient for Esta's special magic stew. Can be obtained by defeating Pumpkin monsters.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Doc_quest_60206a

string.name: STR_DIC_I_Quest_60006c

string.body: Written Directive of the Chief Priest;A document kept by Balaur Followers of [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LF4_SZ_B6]. Difficult to find.

string.body: Red Klaw Egg;A Klaw egg given by [%dic:STR_DIC_N_Rollia]. It will soon hatch.

string.body: Stellin Problem-Solver Mark;Can be made by assembling the five pieces received from [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_OP_Inanna_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Shulack_Stellaky_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Petretta_E], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_IlRina_E], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Apeiron_E] for completing each of their quests.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_60606b
string.body: Chrome Technology Lab Key;A key owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Drakan_Gaurd_80_An]. You can use it to open the prison door of the Technology Lab, where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission04_Venirung01_E] is being held.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_70606b
string.body: Steel Technology Lab Key;A key owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_M_IDF8_Drakan_Gaurd_80_An]. You can use it to open the prison door of the Technology Lab, where [%dic:STR_DIC_N_IDF8_Mission04_Venirung01_E] is being held.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_60607a
string.body: Hidden Key;A key owned by [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF8_SZ_K1_MissionSpot02_Drakan_Gaurd_80_Ae]. You can rescue [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Dgarung_E] with this key.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_quest_63017a

string.body: Clean Stellin Uniform Bundle;A bundle containing clean Stellin uniforms. You cannot open it if you still feel bad about [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Hogda_E].

string.name: STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a
string.body: Genesis Crystal;A crystal that weakly emits Aion's power. Take it to the Genesis Crystal Reward Officer at the Ancient Sanctum of Life or the Ancient Temple of Wisdom at Lakrum to exchange it for a reward.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_pvp_extract_c_80a
string.body: Fighting Spirit Fragment;A material used for PvP equipment promotion. Can be obtained through PvP equipment extraction.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_ldf7_base_matter_enchant_pvp
string.body: Ancient PvP Enchantment Stone Box;A box containing Ancient PvP Enchantment Stones. Can be purchased from the Genesis Crystal Special Consumables Reward Officer at Lakrum.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_pvp_evolve_r2_80a
string.body: Legendary Etium;A material used for PvP equipment promotion. Can be obtained on the battlefield or in the Demaha altar battle.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_guidemission_r2_pvp_all
string.body: Legendary Windiel Equipment Box;[%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF8_Gossip_NPC_Windiel_01]'s equipment box. Open the box to obtain a weapon, head gear, jacket, pants, gloves, and shoes set box for your class.

string.name: STR_DIC_wrap_guidemission_f2_pvp_armor
string.body: Ultimate Dark Talon Armor Box;A box that grants one selected Ultimate Dark Talon armor part. Can be obtained by completing the wind road guide for the [Wind Road/Final] Ultimate PvP equipment.

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_01
string.body: Ancient Windstream Trainee's Jacket;Can be purchased by giving [%dic:STR_DIC_material_ldf7_a0_80a] to [%dic:STR_DIC_N_LDF7_OP_L_pvp_armor_seller] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_02

string.name: STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_upgrade_r0_80a_01
string.body: Legendary Windstream Trainee's Jacket;Can be obtained by promoting [%dic:STR_DIC_guidemission_torso_basic_a0_80a_01] through [%dic:STR_DIC_N_ldf7_op_l_item_ugrader] at [%dic:STR_DIC_W_LDF7_SZ_LOP1].

string.name: STR_DIC_I_coin_ldf5_f_80a

string.body: Katalam Essencetapper;Can be purchased from Special Consumables Contributors [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op_l_ApSeller], [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op02_l_ApSeller], and [%dic:STR_DIC_N_UNITE_LDF5a_op03_l_ApSeller] in Crimson Katalam.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_totalworld_playtime_recovery
string.body: Dimensional Hourglass;Use this to extend your active time in Crimson Katalam.

string.name: STR_WORLD_WRAP_EVENT_D_SOULRING_GIFT
string.body: Solirunerk's gift;Solirunerk's gift for Daevas who aren't aware of rumors spreading in Demaha.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_MIND
string.body: Demaha Essence;An essence with Demaha's energy. There is a chance to obtain 'Shiny Demaha Crystal' and 'Glossy Demaha Crystal'.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_DMAHA_ENERGY
string.body: Shiny Demaha Crystal;An ore glowing with full of Demaha's energy. There is a chance to obtain a special item.

string.name: STR_WORLD_DMAHA_M_DMAHA_LOST_ENERGY
string.body: Glossy Demaha Crystal;An ore which gives off Demaha's energy. A coin needed for item exchange with Famrinerk.

string.name: STR_DMAHA_MIND_D_ENERGY
string.body: Daeva's Crystal; A daeva crystal obtained by defeating opposing race and receiving a reward. Take it to Solirunerk along with Demaha Essence to exchange for 'Concentrated Demaha Crystal'.

string.name: STR_DIC_item_exp_extraction_80a
string.body: Experience Extractor;A tool to craft [%dic:STR_DIC_item_exp_coin_80a]. Can be purchased from the general merchants in Lakrum and Demaha.

string.name: STR_DIC_item_exp_coin_80a
string.body: Experience Mark;A mark that can be obtained by extracting character XP. You need [%dic:STR_DIC_item_exp_extraction_80a] to extract the character's XP.

string.name: STR_DIC_material_pvp_evolve_f2_80a
string.body: Ultimate Etium;A material used for PvP equipment pormotion.

string.name: STR_DIC_I_wrap_ided_01_pve_f2_r_80a_all
string.body: Abyssal Weapon;A weapon that can be obtained through shining crystals.

string.name: STR_DIC_WORLD_QUEST_55021a
string.body: Shiny Ice Hammer;A hammer that Icerunerk uses when making scupltures.

string.name: STR_DIC_WORLD_QUEST_55031a
string.body: Mysterious Chocolate Chip;A material that Chocorinerk is looking for to make sweet chocolates.

string.name: STR_DIC_WORLD_QUEST_80300c
string.body: Sweet Chocolate;Happy Singletons became jealous of the goodies and absconded with the chocolate. Defeat them to get it back.

string.name: STR_DIC_WORLD_QUEST_80301c
string.body: Very Bitter Chocolate;Smug Lovebirds give this chocolate to their SOs. No one wants to eat it, though, since it fills the mouth with bitterness.
